4821  case VK_CONTROL:
4822  return Key::Key_Control;
4823  case VK_MENU:
4824  return Key::Key_Alt;
4825  case VK_PAUSE:
4826  return Key::Key_Pause;
4827  case VK_CAPITAL:
4828  return Key::Key_CapsLock;
4829 
4830  case VK_ESCAPE:
4831  return Key::Key_Escape;
4832  case VK_SPACE:
4833  return Key::Key_Space;
4834  case VK_PRIOR:
4835  return Key::Key_PageUp;
4836  case VK_NEXT:
4837  return Key::Key_PageDown;
4838  case VK_END:
4839  return Key::Key_End;
4840  case VK_HOME:
4841  return Key::Key_Home;
4842  case VK_LEFT:
4843  return Key::Key_Left;
4844  case VK_UP:
4845  return Key::Key_Up;
4846  case VK_RIGHT:
4847  return Key::Key_Right;
4848  case VK_DOWN:
4849  return Key::Key_Down;
4850  case VK_SELECT:
4851  return Key::Key_Select;
4852  case VK_PRINT:
4853  return Key::Key_Print;
4854  case VK_EXECUTE:
4855  return Key::Key_Execute;
4856  case VK_SNAPSHOT:
4857  return Key::Key_Snapshot;
4858  case VK_INSERT:
4859  return Key::Key_Insert;
4860  case VK_DELETE:
4861  return Key::Key_Delete;
4862  case VK_HELP:
4863  return Key::Key_Help;
4864 
4865  case 0x30:
4866  return Key::Key_0;
4867  case 0x31:
4868  return Key::Key_1;
4869  case 0x32:
4870  return Key::Key_2;
4871  case 0x33:
4872  return Key::Key_3;
4873  case 0x34:
4874  return Key::Key_4;
4875  case 0x35:
4876  return Key::Key_5;
4877  case 0x36:
4878  return Key::Key_6;
4879  case 0x37:
4880  return Key::Key_7;
4881  case 0x38:
4882  return Key::Key_8;
4883  case 0x39:
4884  return Key::Key_9;
4885 
4886  case 0x41:
4887  return Key::Key_A;
4888  case 0x42:
4889  return Key::Key_B;
4890  case 0x43:
4891  return Key::Key_C;
4892  case 0x44:
4893  return Key::Key_D;
4894  case 0x45:
4895  return Key::Key_E;
4896  case 0x46:
4897  return Key::Key_F;
4898  case 0x47:
4899  return Key::Key_G;
4900  case 0x48:
4901  return Key::Key_H;
4902  case 0x49:
4903  return Key::Key_I;
4904  case 0x4A:
4905  return Key::Key_J;
4906  case 0x4B:
4907  return Key::Key_K;
4908  case 0x4C:
4909  return Key::Key_L;
4910  case 0x4D:
4911  return Key::Key_M;
4912  case 0x4E:
4913  return Key::Key_N;
4914  case 0x4F:
4915  return Key::Key_O;
4916  case 0x50:
4917  return Key::Key_P;
4918  case 0x51:
4919  return Key::Key_Q;
4920  case 0x52:
4921  return Key::Key_R;
4922  case 0x53:
4923  return Key::Key_S;
4924  case 0x54:
4925  return Key::Key_T;
4926  case 0x55:
4927  return Key::Key_U;
4928  case 0x56:
4929  return Key::Key_V;
4930  case 0x57:
4931  return Key::Key_W;
4932  case 0x58:
4933  return Key::Key_X;
4934  case 0x59:
4935  return Key::Key_Y;
4936  case 0x5A:
4937  return Key::Key_Z;
4938 
4939  case VK_LWIN:
4940  return Key::Key_LeftWin;
4941  case VK_RWIN:
4942  return Key::Key_RightWin;
4943  case VK_APPS:
4944  return Key::Key_Apps;
4945 
4946  case VK_SLEEP:
4947  return Key::Key_Sleep;
4948  case VK_NUMPAD0:
4949  return Key::Key_NumPad0;
4950  case VK_NUMPAD1:
4951  return Key::Key_NumPad1;
4952  case VK_NUMPAD2:
4953  return Key::Key_NumPad2;
4954  case VK_NUMPAD3:
4955  return Key::Key_NumPad3;
4956  case VK_NUMPAD4:
4957  return Key::Key_NumPad4;
4958  case VK_NUMPAD5:
4959  return Key::Key_NumPad5;
4960  case VK_NUMPAD6:
4961  return Key::Key_NumPad6;
4962  case VK_NUMPAD7:
4963  return Key::Key_NumPad7;
4964  case VK_NUMPAD8:
4965  return Key::Key_NumPad8;
4966  case VK_NUMPAD9:
4967  return Key::Key_NumPad9;
4968  case VK_MULTIPLY:
4969  return Key::Key_Multiply;
4970  case VK_ADD:
4971  return Key::Key_Add;
4972  case VK_SEPARATOR:
4973  return Key::Key_Separator;
4974  case VK_SUBTRACT:
4975  return Key::Key_Substract;
4976  case VK_DECIMAL:
4977  return Key::Key_Decimal;
4978  case VK_DIVIDE:
4979  return Key::Key_Divide;
4980  case VK_F1:
4981  return Key::Key_F1;
4982  case VK_F2:
4983  return Key::Key_F2;
4984  case VK_F3:
4985  return Key::Key_F3;
4986  case VK_F4:
4987  return Key::Key_F4;
4988  case VK_F5:
4989  return Key::Key_F5;
4990  case VK_F6:
4991  return Key::Key_F6;
4992  case VK_F7:
4993  return Key::Key_F7;
4994  case VK_F8:
4995  return Key::Key_F8;
4996  case VK_F9:
4997  return Key::Key_F9;
4998  case VK_F10:
4999  return Key::Key_F10;
5000  case VK_F11:
5001  return Key::Key_F11;
5002  case VK_F12:
5003  return Key::Key_F12;
5004  case VK_F13:
5005  return Key::Key_F13;
5006  case VK_F14:
5007  return Key::Key_F14;
5008  case VK_F15:
5009  return Key::Key_F15;
5010  case VK_F16:
5011  return Key::Key_F16;
5012  case VK_F17:
5013  return Key::Key_F17;
5014  case VK_F18:
5015  return Key::Key_F18;
5016  case VK_F19:
5017  return Key::Key_F19;
5018  case VK_F20:
5019  return Key::Key_F20;
5020  case VK_F21:
5021  return Key::Key_F21;
5022  case VK_F22:
5023  return Key::Key_F22;
5024  case VK_F23:
5025  return Key::Key_F23;
5026  case VK_F24:
5027  return Key::Key_F24;
5028 
5029  case VK_LSHIFT:
5030  return Key::Key_LeftShift;
5031  case VK_RSHIFT:
5032  return Key::Key_RightShift;
5033  case VK_LCONTROL:
5034  return Key::Key_LeftControl;
5035  case VK_RCONTROL:
5036  return Key::Key_RightControl;
5037  case VK_LMENU:
5038  return Key::Key_LeftAlt;
5039  case VK_RMENU:
5040  return Key::Key_RightAlt;
5041 
5042  default:
5043  return Key::Key_None;
5044  }
5045  }
5046 
5047  fpl_internal_inline void Win32PushKeyboardEvent(const window::KeyboardEventType keyboardEventType, const uint64_t keyCode, const window::KeyboardModifierFlags modifiers, const bool isDown) {
5048  using namespace window;
5049  Event newEvent = {};
5050  newEvent.type = EventType::Keyboard;
5051  newEvent.keyboard.keyCode = keyCode;
5052  newEvent.keyboard.mappedKey = Win32MapVirtualKey(keyCode);
5053  newEvent.keyboard.type = keyboardEventType;
5054  newEvent.keyboard.modifiers = modifiers;
5055  PushEvent(newEvent);
5056  }
5057 
5058  fpl_internal_inline bool Win32IsKeyDown(const Win32APIFunctions &wapi, const uint64_t keyCode) {
5059  bool result = (wapi.user.getAsyncKeyState((int)keyCode) & 0x8000) > 0;
5060  return(result);
5061  }
5062 
5063  LRESULT CALLBACK Win32MessageProc(HWND hwnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam) {
5064  using namespace window;
5065 
5066  FPL_ASSERT(global__AppState != nullptr);
5067  PlatformAppState *appState = global__AppState;
5068  Win32AppState &win32State = appState->win32;
5069  Win32WindowState &win32Window = appState->window.win32;
5070  const Win32APIFunctions &wapi = win32State.winApi;
5071 
5072  if(!win32Window.windowHandle) {
5073  return win32_defWindowProc(hwnd, msg, wParam, lParam);
5074  }
5075 
5076  LRESULT result = 0;
5077  switch(msg) {
5078  case WM_DESTROY:
5079  case WM_CLOSE:
5080  {
5081  win32Window.isRunning = false;
5082  } break;
5083 
5084  case WM_SIZE:
5085  {
5086 # if defined(FPL_ENABLE_VIDEO_SOFTWARE)
5087  if(appState->currentSettings.video.driver == VideoDriverType::Software) {
5088  if(appState->initSettings.video.isAutoSize) {
5089  uint32_t w = LOWORD(lParam);
5090  uint32_t h = HIWORD(lParam);
5091  video::ResizeVideoBackBuffer(w, h);
5092  }
5093  }
5094 # endif
5095 
5096  Event newEvent = {};
5097  newEvent.type = EventType::Window;
5098  newEvent.window.type = WindowEventType::Resized;
5099  newEvent.window.width = LOWORD(lParam);
5100  newEvent.window.height = HIWORD(lParam);
5101  platform::PushEvent(newEvent);
5102  } break;
5103 
5104  case WM_SYSKEYDOWN:
5105  case WM_SYSKEYUP:
5106  case WM_KEYDOWN:
5107  case WM_KEYUP:
5108  {
5109  uint64_t keyCode = wParam;
5110  bool wasDown = ((int)(lParam & (1 << 30)) != 0);
5111  bool isDown = ((int)(lParam & (1 << 31)) == 0);
5112 
5113  bool altKeyWasDown = platform::Win32IsKeyDown(wapi, VK_MENU);
5114  bool shiftKeyWasDown = platform::Win32IsKeyDown(wapi, VK_LSHIFT);
5115  bool ctrlKeyWasDown = platform::Win32IsKeyDown(wapi, VK_LCONTROL);
5116  bool superKeyWasDown = platform::Win32IsKeyDown(wapi, VK_LMENU);
5117 
5118  KeyboardEventType keyEventType = isDown ? KeyboardEventType::KeyDown : KeyboardEventType::KeyUp;
5119  KeyboardModifierFlags modifiers = KeyboardModifierFlags::None;
5120  if(altKeyWasDown) {
5121  modifiers |= KeyboardModifierFlags::Alt;
5122  }
5123  if(shiftKeyWasDown) {
5124  modifiers |= KeyboardModifierFlags::Shift;
5125  }
5126  if(ctrlKeyWasDown) {
5127  modifiers |= KeyboardModifierFlags::Ctrl;
5128  }
5129  if(superKeyWasDown) {
5130  modifiers |= KeyboardModifierFlags::Super;
5131  }
5132  platform::Win32PushKeyboardEvent(keyEventType, keyCode, modifiers, isDown);
5133 
5134  if(wasDown != isDown) {
5135  if(isDown) {
5136  if(keyCode == VK_F4 && altKeyWasDown) {
5137  win32Window.isRunning = 0;
5138  }
5139  }
5140  }
5141  } break;
5142 
5143  case WM_CHAR:
5144  {
5145  // @TODO(final): Add unicode support (WM_UNICHAR)!
5146  if(wParam >= 0 && wParam < 256) {
5147  uint64_t keyCode = wParam;
5148  KeyboardModifierFlags modifiers = KeyboardModifierFlags::None;
5149  platform::Win32PushKeyboardEvent(KeyboardEventType::CharInput, keyCode, modifiers, 0);
5150  }
5151  } break;
5152 
5153  case WM_ACTIVATE:
5154  {
5155  Event newEvent = {};
5156  newEvent.type = EventType::Window;
5157  if(wParam == WA_INACTIVE) {
5158  newEvent.window.type = WindowEventType::LostFocus;
5159  } else {
5160  newEvent.window.type = WindowEventType::GotFocus;
5161  }
5162  platform::PushEvent(newEvent);
5163  } break;
5164 
5165  case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
5166  case WM_LBUTTONUP:
5167  {
5168  MouseEventType mouseEventType;
5169  if(msg == WM_LBUTTONDOWN) {
5170  mouseEventType = MouseEventType::ButtonDown;
5171  } else {
5172  mouseEventType = MouseEventType::ButtonUp;
5173  }
5174  platform::Win32PushMouseEvent(mouseEventType, MouseButtonType::Left, lParam, wParam);
5175  } break;
5176  case WM_RBUTTONDOWN:
5177  case WM_RBUTTONUP:
5178  {
5179  MouseEventType mouseEventType;
5180  if(msg == WM_RBUTTONDOWN) {
5181  mouseEventType = MouseEventType::ButtonDown;
5182  } else {
5183  mouseEventType = MouseEventType::ButtonUp;
5184  }
5185  platform::Win32PushMouseEvent(mouseEventType, MouseButtonType::Right, lParam, wParam);
5186  } break;
5187  case WM_MBUTTONDOWN:
5188  case WM_MBUTTONUP:
5189  {
5190  MouseEventType mouseEventType;
5191  if(msg == WM_MBUTTONDOWN) {
5192  mouseEventType = MouseEventType::ButtonDown;
5193  } else {
5194  mouseEventType = MouseEventType::ButtonUp;
5195  }
5196  platform::Win32PushMouseEvent(mouseEventType, MouseButtonType::Middle, lParam, wParam);
5197  } break;
5198  case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
5199  {
5200  platform::Win32PushMouseEvent(MouseEventType::Move, MouseButtonType::None, lParam, wParam);
5201  } break;
5202  case WM_MOUSEWHEEL:
5203  {
5204  platform::Win32PushMouseEvent(MouseEventType::Wheel, MouseButtonType::None, lParam, wParam);
5205  } break;
5206 
5207  case WM_SETCURSOR:
5208  {
5209  // @TODO(final): This is not right to assume default cursor always, because the size cursor does not work this way!
5210  if(win32Window.isCursorActive) {
5211  HCURSOR cursor = wapi.user.getCursor();
5212  wapi.user.setCursor(cursor);
5213  } else {
5214  wapi.user.setCursor(nullptr);
5215  return 1;
5216  }
5217  } break;
5218 
5219  case WM_ERASEBKGND:
5220  {
5221  // Prevent erase background always
5222  return 1;
5223  } break;
5224 
5225  default:
5226  break;
5227  }
5228  result = win32_defWindowProc(hwnd, msg, wParam, lParam);
5229  return (result);
5230  }
5231 
5232  fpl_internal bool Win32InitWindow(const Settings &initSettings, WindowSettings &currentWindowSettings, PlatformAppState *platAppState, Win32AppState &appState, Win32WindowState &windowState, callback_PrepareWindowForVideoAfter *prepareVideoForWindowAfter) {
5233  const Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
5234  const WindowSettings &initWindowSettings = initSettings.window;
5235 
5236  // Register window class
5237  win32_wndclassex windowClass = {};
5238  windowClass.cbSize = sizeof(win32_wndclassex);
5239  windowClass.hInstance = GetModuleHandleA(nullptr);
5240  windowClass.hbrBackground = (HBRUSH)(COLOR_WINDOW + 1);
5241  windowClass.cbSize = sizeof(windowClass);
5242  windowClass.style = CS_HREDRAW | CS_VREDRAW;
5243  windowClass.hCursor = win32_loadCursor(nullptr, IDC_ARROW);
5244  windowClass.hIcon = win32_loadIcon(nullptr, IDI_APPLICATION);
5245  windowClass.hIconSm = win32_loadIcon(nullptr, IDI_APPLICATION);
5246  windowClass.lpszClassName = FPL_WIN32_CLASSNAME;
5247  windowClass.lpfnWndProc = Win32MessageProc;
5248  windowClass.style |= CS_OWNDC;
5249  win32_copyString(windowClass.lpszClassName, win32_getStringLength(windowClass.lpszClassName), windowState.windowClass, FPL_ARRAYCOUNT(windowState.windowClass));
5250  if(win32_registerClassEx(&windowClass) == 0) {
5251  common::PushError("Failed Registering Window Class '%s'", windowState.windowClass);
5252  return false;
5253  }
5254 
5255  // Create window
5256  platform::win32_char windowTitleBuffer[1024];
5257  platform::win32_char *windowTitle = FPL_WIN32_UNNAMED_WINDOW;
5258  currentWindowSettings.isFullscreen = false;
5259  if(strings::GetAnsiStringLength(initWindowSettings.windowTitle) > 0) {
5260  win32_ansiToString(initWindowSettings.windowTitle, strings::GetAnsiStringLength(initWindowSettings.windowTitle), windowTitleBuffer, FPL_ARRAYCOUNT(windowTitleBuffer));
5261  windowTitle = windowTitleBuffer;
5262  strings::CopyAnsiString(initWindowSettings.windowTitle, strings::GetAnsiStringLength(initWindowSettings.windowTitle), currentWindowSettings.windowTitle, FPL_ARRAYCOUNT(currentWindowSettings.windowTitle));
5263  }
5264 
5265  DWORD style;
5266  DWORD exStyle;
5267  if(initWindowSettings.isResizable) {
5268  style = Win32ResizeableWindowStyle;
5269  exStyle = Win32ResizeableWindowExtendedStyle;
5270  currentWindowSettings.isResizable = true;
5271  } else {
5272  style = Win32NonResizableWindowStyle;
5273  exStyle = Win32NonResizableWindowExtendedStyle;
5274  currentWindowSettings.isResizable = false;
5275  }
5276 
5277  int windowX = CW_USEDEFAULT;
5278  int windowY = CW_USEDEFAULT;
5279  int windowWidth;
5280  int windowHeight;
5281  if((initWindowSettings.windowWidth > 0) &&
5282  (initWindowSettings.windowHeight > 0)) {
5283  RECT windowRect;
5284  windowRect.left = 0;
5285  windowRect.top = 0;
5286  windowRect.right = initWindowSettings.windowWidth;
5287  windowRect.bottom = initWindowSettings.windowHeight;
5288  wapi.user.adjustWindowRect(&windowRect, style, false);
5289  windowWidth = windowRect.right - windowRect.left;
5290  windowHeight = windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top;
5291  } else {
5292  // @NOTE(final): Operating system decide how big the window should be.
5293  windowWidth = CW_USEDEFAULT;
5294  windowHeight = CW_USEDEFAULT;
5295  }
5296 
5297 
5298  // Create window
5299  windowState.windowHandle = win32_createWindowEx(exStyle, windowClass.lpszClassName, windowTitle, style, windowX, windowY, windowWidth, windowHeight, nullptr, nullptr, windowClass.hInstance, nullptr);
5300  if(windowState.windowHandle == nullptr) {
5301  common::PushError("Failed creating window for class '%s' and position (%d x %d) with size (%d x %d)", windowState.windowClass, windowWidth, windowHeight, windowWidth, windowHeight);
5302  return false;
5303  }
5304 
5305  // Get actual window size and store results
5306  currentWindowSettings.windowWidth = windowWidth;
5307  currentWindowSettings.windowHeight = windowHeight;
5308  RECT clientRect;
5309  if(wapi.user.getClientRect(windowState.windowHandle, &clientRect)) {
5310  currentWindowSettings.windowWidth = clientRect.right - clientRect.left;
5311  currentWindowSettings.windowHeight = clientRect.bottom - clientRect.top;
5312  }
5313 
5314  // Get device context so we can swap the back and front buffer
5315  windowState.deviceContext = wapi.user.getDC(windowState.windowHandle);
5316  if(windowState.deviceContext == nullptr) {
5317  common::PushError("Failed aquiring device context from window '%d'", windowState.windowHandle);
5318  return false;
5319  }
5320 
5321  // Prepare video if needed
5322  if((prepareVideoForWindowAfter != nullptr) && (platAppState->initFlags & InitFlags::Video)) {
5323  const VideoSettings &initVideoSettings = initSettings.video;
5324  prepareVideoForWindowAfter(initVideoSettings, platAppState);
5325  }
5326 
5327  // Enter fullscreen if needed
5328  if(initWindowSettings.isFullscreen) {
5329  window::SetWindowFullscreen(true, initWindowSettings.fullscreenWidth, initWindowSettings.fullscreenHeight);
5330  }
5331 
5332  // Show window
5333  wapi.user.showWindow(windowState.windowHandle, SW_SHOW);
5334  wapi.user.updateWindow(windowState.windowHandle);
5335 
5336  // Cursor is visible at start
5337  windowState.defaultCursor = windowClass.hCursor;
5338  windowState.isCursorActive = true;
5339  windowState.isRunning = true;
5340 
5341  return true;
5342  }
5343 
5344  fpl_internal void Win32ReleaseWindow(const Win32InitState &initState, const Win32AppState &appState, Win32WindowState &windowState) {
5345  const Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
5346 
5347  if(windowState.deviceContext != nullptr) {
5348  wapi.user.releaseDC(windowState.windowHandle, windowState.deviceContext);
5349  windowState.deviceContext = nullptr;
5350  }
5351 
5352  if(windowState.windowHandle != nullptr) {
5353  wapi.user.destroyWindow(windowState.windowHandle);
5354  windowState.windowHandle = nullptr;
5355  win32_unregisterClass(windowState.windowClass, initState.appInstance);
5356  }
5357  }
5358 
5359  struct Win32CommandLineUTF8Arguments {
5360  void *mem;
5361  char **args;
5362  uint32_t count;
5363  };
5364  fpl_internal Win32CommandLineUTF8Arguments Win32ParseWideArguments(LPWSTR cmdLine) {
5365  Win32CommandLineUTF8Arguments args = {};
5366 
5367  // @NOTE(final): Temporary load and unload shell32 for parsing the arguments
5368  HMODULE shellapiLibrary = ::LoadLibraryA("shell32.dll");
5369  if(shellapiLibrary != nullptr) {
5370  win32_func_CommandLineToArgvW *commandLineToArgvW = (win32_func_CommandLineToArgvW *)::GetProcAddress(shellapiLibrary, "CommandLineToArgvW");
5371  if(commandLineToArgvW != nullptr) {
5372  // Parse arguments and compute total UTF8 string length
5373  int executableFilePathArgumentCount = 0;
5374  wchar_t **executableFilePathArgs = commandLineToArgvW(L"", &executableFilePathArgumentCount);
5375  uint32_t executableFilePathLen = 0;
5376  for(int i = 0; i < executableFilePathArgumentCount; ++i) {
5377  if(i > 0) {
5378  // Include whitespace
5379  executableFilePathLen++;
5380  }
5381  uint32_t sourceLen = strings::GetWideStringLength(executableFilePathArgs[i]);
5382  uint32_t destLen = ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, executableFilePathArgs[i], sourceLen, nullptr, 0, 0, 0);
5383  executableFilePathLen += destLen;
5384  }
5385 
5386  // @NOTE(final): Do not parse the arguments when there are no actual arguments, otherwise we will get back the executable arguments again.
5387  int actualArgumentCount = 0;
5388  wchar_t **actualArgs = nullptr;
5389  uint32_t actualArgumentsLen = 0;
5390  if(cmdLine != nullptr && strings::GetWideStringLength(cmdLine) > 0) {
5391  actualArgs = commandLineToArgvW(cmdLine, &actualArgumentCount);
5392  for(int i = 0; i < actualArgumentCount; ++i) {
5393  uint32_t sourceLen = strings::GetWideStringLength(actualArgs[i]);
5394  uint32_t destLen = ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, actualArgs[i], sourceLen, nullptr, 0, 0, 0);
5395  actualArgumentsLen += destLen;
5396  }
5397  }
5398 
5399  // Calculate argument
5400  args.count = 1 + actualArgumentCount;
5401  uint32_t totalStringLen = executableFilePathLen + actualArgumentsLen + args.count;
5402  size_t singleArgStringSize = sizeof(char) * (totalStringLen);
5403  size_t arbitaryPadding = sizeof(char) * 8;
5404  size_t argArraySize = sizeof(char **) * args.count;
5405  size_t totalArgSize = singleArgStringSize + arbitaryPadding + argArraySize;
5406 
5407  args.mem = (uint8_t *)memory::MemoryAllocate(totalArgSize);
5408  char *argsString = (char *)args.mem;
5409  args.args = (char **)((uint8_t *)args.mem + singleArgStringSize + arbitaryPadding);
5410 
5411  // Convert executable path to UTF8
5412  char *destArg = argsString;
5413  {
5414  args.args[0] = argsString;
5415  for(int i = 0; i < executableFilePathArgumentCount; ++i) {
5416  if(i > 0) {
5417  *destArg++ = ' ';
5418  }
5419  wchar_t *sourceArg = executableFilePathArgs[i];
5420  uint32_t sourceArgLen = strings::GetWideStringLength(sourceArg);
5421  uint32_t destArgLen = ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, sourceArg, sourceArgLen, nullptr, 0, 0, 0);
5422  ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, sourceArg, sourceArgLen, destArg, destArgLen, 0, 0);
5423  destArg += destArgLen;
5424  }
5425  *destArg++ = 0;
5426  ::LocalFree(executableFilePathArgs);
5427  }
5428 
5429  // Convert actual arguments to UTF8
5430  if(actualArgumentCount > 0) {
5431  FPL_ASSERT(actualArgs != nullptr);
5432  for(int i = 0; i < actualArgumentCount; ++i) {
5433  args.args[1 + i] = destArg;
5434  wchar_t *sourceArg = actualArgs[i];
5435  uint32_t sourceArgLen = strings::GetWideStringLength(sourceArg);
5436  uint32_t destArgLen = ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, sourceArg, sourceArgLen, nullptr, 0, 0, 0);
5437  ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, sourceArg, sourceArgLen, destArg, destArgLen, 0, 0);
5438  destArg += destArgLen;
5439  *destArg++ = 0;
5440  }
5441  LocalFree(actualArgs);
5442  }
5443  }
5444  ::FreeLibrary(shellapiLibrary);
5445  shellapiLibrary = nullptr;
5446  }
5447  return(args);
5448  }
5449 
5450  fpl_internal Win32CommandLineUTF8Arguments Win32ParseAnsiArguments(LPSTR cmdLine) {
5451  Win32CommandLineUTF8Arguments result;
5452  if(cmdLine != nullptr) {
5453  uint32_t ansiSourceLen = strings::GetAnsiStringLength(cmdLine);
5454  uint32_t wideDestLen = ::MultiByteToWideChar(CP_ACP, 0, cmdLine, ansiSourceLen, nullptr, 0);
5455  // @TODO(final): Can we use a stack allocation here?
5456  wchar_t *wideCmdLine = (wchar_t *)memory::MemoryAllocate(sizeof(wchar_t) * (wideDestLen + 1));
5457  ::MultiByteToWideChar(CP_ACP, 0, cmdLine, ansiSourceLen, wideCmdLine, wideDestLen);
5458  wideCmdLine[wideDestLen] = 0;
5459  result = Win32ParseWideArguments(wideCmdLine);
5460  memory::MemoryFree(wideCmdLine);
5461  } else {
5462  result = Win32ParseWideArguments(L"");
5463  }
5464  return(result);
5465  }
5466 
5467 # endif // FPL_ENABLE_WINDOW
5468 
5469  fpl_internal void Win32LoadXInput(Win32XInputState &xinputState) {
5470  // Windows 8
5471  HMODULE xinputLibrary = ::LoadLibraryA("xinput1_4.dll");
5472  if(!xinputLibrary) {
5473  // Windows 7
5474  xinputLibrary = ::LoadLibraryA("xinput1_3.dll");
5475  }
5476  if(!xinputLibrary) {
5477  // Windows Generic
5478  xinputLibrary = ::LoadLibraryA("xinput9_1_0.dll");
5479  }
5480  Win32XInputFunctions &inputFuncs = xinputState.xinputApi;
5481  if(xinputLibrary) {
5482  inputFuncs.xinputLibrary = xinputLibrary;
5483  inputFuncs.xInputGetState = (win32_func_XInputGetState *)::GetProcAddress(xinputLibrary, "XInputGetState");
5484  inputFuncs.xInputGetCapabilities = (win32_func_XInputGetCapabilities *)::GetProcAddress(xinputLibrary, "XInputGetCapabilities");
5485  }
5486  if(inputFuncs.xInputGetState == nullptr) {
5487  inputFuncs.xInputGetState = Win32XInputGetStateStub;
5488  }
5489  if(inputFuncs.xInputGetCapabilities == nullptr) {
5490  inputFuncs.xInputGetCapabilities = Win32XInputGetCapabilitiesStub;
5491  }
5492  }
5493 
5494  fpl_internal void Win32UnloadXInput(Win32XInputState &xinputState) {
5495  Win32XInputFunctions &inputFuncs = xinputState.xinputApi;
5496  if(inputFuncs.xinputLibrary) {
5497  ::FreeLibrary(inputFuncs.xinputLibrary);
5498  inputFuncs.xinputLibrary = nullptr;
5499  inputFuncs.xInputGetState = Win32XInputGetStateStub;
5500  }
5501  }
5502 
5503  fpl_internal bool Win32LoadAPI(Win32APIFunctions &wapi) {
5504  // Shell32
5505  {
5506  const char *shellLibraryName = "shell32.dll";
5507  HMODULE library = wapi.shell.shellLibrary = ::LoadLibraryA(shellLibraryName);
5508  if(library == nullptr) {
5509  common::PushError("Failed loading win32 library '%s'", shellLibraryName);
5510  return false;
5511  }
5512  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, shellLibraryName, wapi.shell.commandLineToArgvW, win32_func_CommandLineToArgvW, "CommandLineToArgvW");
5513  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, shellLibraryName, wapi.shell.shGetFolderPathA, win32_func_SHGetFolderPathA, "SHGetFolderPathA");
5514  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, shellLibraryName, wapi.shell.shGetFolderPathW, win32_func_SHGetFolderPathW, "SHGetFolderPathW");
5515  }
5516 
5517  // User32
5518  {
5519  const char *userLibraryName = "user32.dll";
5520  HMODULE library = wapi.user.userLibrary = ::LoadLibraryA(userLibraryName);
5521  if(library == nullptr) {
5522  common::PushError("Failed loading win32 library '%s'", userLibraryName);
5523  return false;
5524  }
5525 
5526  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.registerClassExA, win32_func_RegisterClassExA, "RegisterClassExA");
5527  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.registerClassExW, win32_func_RegisterClassExW, "RegisterClassExW");
5528  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.unregisterClassA, win32_func_UnregisterClassA, "UnregisterClassA");
5529  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.unregisterClassW, win32_func_UnregisterClassW, "UnregisterClassW");
5530  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.showWindow, win32_func_ShowWindow, "ShowWindow");
5531  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.destroyWindow, win32_func_DestroyWindow, "DestroyWindow");
5532  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.updateWindow, win32_func_UpdateWindow, "UpdateWindow");
5533  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.translateMessage, win32_func_TranslateMessage, "TranslateMessage");
5534  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.dispatchMessageA, win32_func_DispatchMessageA, "DispatchMessageA");
5535  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.dispatchMessageW, win32_func_DispatchMessageW, "DispatchMessageW");
5536  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.peekMessageA, win32_func_PeekMessageA, "PeekMessageA");
5537  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.peekMessageW, win32_func_PeekMessageW, "PeekMessageW");
5538  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.defWindowProcA, win32_func_DefWindowProcA, "DefWindowProcA");
5539  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.defWindowProcW, win32_func_DefWindowProcW, "DefWindowProcW");
5540  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.createWindowExA, win32_func_CreateWindowExA, "CreateWindowExA");
5541  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.createWindowExW, win32_func_CreateWindowExW, "CreateWindowExW");
5542  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setWindowPos, win32_func_SetWindowPos, "SetWindowPos");
5543  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getWindowPlacement, win32_func_GetWindowPlacement, "GetWindowPlacement");
5544  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setWindowPlacement, win32_func_SetWindowPlacement, "SetWindowPlacement");
5545  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getClientRect, win32_func_GetClientRect, "GetClientRect");
5546  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getWindowRect, win32_func_GetWindowRect, "GetWindowRect");
5547  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.adjustWindowRect, win32_func_AdjustWindowRect, "AdjustWindowRect");
5548  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getAsyncKeyState, win32_func_GetAsyncKeyState, "GetAsyncKeyState");
5549  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.mapVirtualKeyA, win32_func_MapVirtualKeyA, "MapVirtualKeyA");
5550  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.mapVirtualKeyW, win32_func_MapVirtualKeyW, "MapVirtualKeyW");
5551  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setCursor, win32_func_SetCursor, "SetCursor");
5552  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getCursor, win32_func_GetCursor, "GetCursor");
5553  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.loadCursorA, win32_func_LoadCursorA, "LoadCursorA");
5554  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.loadCursorW, win32_func_LoadCursorW, "LoadCursorW");
5555  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.loadIconA, win32_func_LoadIconA, "LoadCursorA");
5556  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.loadIconW, win32_func_LoadIconW, "LoadIconW");
5557  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setWindowTextA, win32_func_SetWindowTextA, "SetWindowTextA");
5558  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setWindowTextW, win32_func_SetWindowTextW, "SetWindowTextW");
5559  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setWindowLongA, win32_func_SetWindowLongA, "SetWindowLongA");
5560  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setWindowLongW, win32_func_SetWindowLongW, "SetWindowLongW");
5561  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getWindowLongA, win32_func_GetWindowLongA, "GetWindowLongA");
5562  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getWindowLongW, win32_func_GetWindowLongW, "GetWindowLongW");
5563 
5564 # if defined(FPL_ARCH_X64)
5565  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setWindowLongPtrA, win32_func_SetWindowLongPtrA, "SetWindowLongPtrA");
5566  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setWindowLongPtrW, win32_func_SetWindowLongPtrW, "SetWindowLongPtrW");
5567  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getWindowLongPtrA, win32_func_GetWindowLongPtrA, "GetWindowLongPtrA");
5568  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getWindowLongPtrW, win32_func_GetWindowLongPtrW, "GetWindowLongPtrW");
5569 # endif
5570 
5571  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.releaseDC, win32_func_ReleaseDC, "ReleaseDC");
5572  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getDC, win32_func_GetDC, "GetDC");
5573  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.changeDisplaySettingsA, win32_func_ChangeDisplaySettingsA, "ChangeDisplaySettingsA");
5574  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.changeDisplaySettingsW, win32_func_ChangeDisplaySettingsW, "ChangeDisplaySettingsW");
5575  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.enumDisplaySettingsA, win32_func_EnumDisplaySettingsA, "EnumDisplaySettingsA");
5576  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.enumDisplaySettingsW, win32_func_EnumDisplaySettingsW, "EnumDisplaySettingsW");
5577 
5578  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.openClipboard, win32_func_OpenClipboard, "OpenClipboard");
5579  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.closeClipboard, win32_func_CloseClipboard, "CloseClipboard");
5580  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.emptyClipboard, win32_func_EmptyClipboard, "EmptyClipboard");
5581  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.setClipboardData, win32_func_SetClipboardData, "SetClipboardData");
5582  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getClipboardData, win32_func_GetClipboardData, "GetClipboardData");
5583 
5584  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getDesktopWindow, win32_func_GetDesktopWindow, "GetDesktopWindow");
5585  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getForegroundWindow, win32_func_GetForegroundWindow, "GetForegroundWindow");
5586 
5587  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.isZoomed, win32_func_IsZoomed, "IsZoomed");
5588  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.sendMessageA, win32_func_SendMessageA, "SendMessageA");
5589  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.sendMessageW, win32_func_SendMessageW, "SendMessageW");
5590  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getMonitorInfoA, win32_func_GetMonitorInfoA, "GetMonitorInfoA");
5591  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.getMonitorInfoW, win32_func_GetMonitorInfoW, "GetMonitorInfoW");
5592  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.monitorFromRect, win32_func_MonitorFromRect, "MonitorFromRect");
5593  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, userLibraryName, wapi.user.monitorFromWindow, win32_func_MonitorFromWindow, "MonitorFromWindow");
5594  }
5595 
5596  // GDI32
5597  {
5598  const char *gdiLibraryName = "gdi32.dll";
5599  HMODULE library = wapi.gdi.gdiLibrary = ::LoadLibraryA(gdiLibraryName);
5600  if(library == nullptr) {
5601  common::PushError("Failed loading win32 library '%s'", gdiLibraryName);
5602  return false;
5603  }
5604 
5605  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, gdiLibraryName, wapi.gdi.choosePixelFormat, win32_func_ChoosePixelFormat, "ChoosePixelFormat");
5606  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, gdiLibraryName, wapi.gdi.setPixelFormat, win32_func_SetPixelFormat, "SetPixelFormat");
5607  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, gdiLibraryName, wapi.gdi.describePixelFormat, win32_func_DescribePixelFormat, "DescribePixelFormat");
5608  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, gdiLibraryName, wapi.gdi.stretchDIBits, win32_func_StretchDIBits, "StretchDIBits");
5609  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, gdiLibraryName, wapi.gdi.deleteObject, win32_func_DeleteObject, "DeleteObject");
5610  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, gdiLibraryName, wapi.gdi.swapBuffers, win32_func_SwapBuffers, "SwapBuffers");
5611  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, gdiLibraryName, wapi.gdi.getDeviceCaps, win32_func_GetDeviceCaps, "GetDeviceCaps");
5612  }
5613 
5614  // OLE32
5615  {
5616  const char *oleLibraryName = "ole32.dll";
5617  HMODULE library = wapi.ole.oleLibrary = ::LoadLibraryA(oleLibraryName);
5618  if(library == nullptr) {
5619  common::PushError("Failed loading win32 library '%s'", oleLibraryName);
5620  return false;
5621  }
5622 
5623  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, oleLibraryName, wapi.ole.coInitializeEx, win32_func_CoInitializeEx, "CoInitializeEx");
5624  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, oleLibraryName, wapi.ole.coUninitialize, win32_func_CoUninitialize, "CoUninitialize");
5625  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, oleLibraryName, wapi.ole.coCreateInstance, win32_func_CoCreateInstance, "CoCreateInstance");
5626  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, oleLibraryName, wapi.ole.coTaskMemFree, win32_func_CoTaskMemFree, "CoTaskMemFree");
5627  FPL_WIN32_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(library, oleLibraryName, wapi.ole.propVariantClear, win32_func_PropVariantClear, "PropVariantClear");
5628  }
5629 
5630 
5631  return true;
5632  }
5633 
5634  fpl_internal void Win32UnloadAPI(Win32APIFunctions &wapi) {
5635  if(wapi.ole.oleLibrary != nullptr) {
5636  ::FreeLibrary(wapi.ole.oleLibrary);
5637  wapi.ole = {};
5638  }
5639  if(wapi.gdi.gdiLibrary != nullptr) {
5640  ::FreeLibrary(wapi.gdi.gdiLibrary);
5641  wapi.gdi = {};
5642  }
5643  if(wapi.user.userLibrary != nullptr) {
5644  ::FreeLibrary(wapi.user.userLibrary);
5645  wapi.user = {};
5646  }
5647  if(wapi.shell.shellLibrary != nullptr) {
5648  ::FreeLibrary(wapi.shell.shellLibrary);
5649  wapi.shell = {};
5650  }
5651  }
5652 
5653  fpl_internal bool Win32ThreadWaitForMultiple(threading::ThreadContext *contexts[], const uint32_t count, const bool waitForAll, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
5654  if(contexts == nullptr) {
5655  common::PushError("Contexts parameter are not allowed to be null");
5656  return false;
5657  }
5658  if(count > common::MAX_THREAD_COUNT) {
5659  common::PushError("Count parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", count, common::MAX_THREAD_COUNT);
5660  return false;
5661  }
5662  HANDLE threadHandles[common::MAX_THREAD_COUNT];
5663  for(uint32_t index = 0; index < count; ++index) {
5664  threading::ThreadContext *context = contexts[index];
5665  if(context == nullptr) {
5666  common::PushError("Thread context for index '%d' are not allowed to be null", index);
5667  return false;
5668  }
5669  if(context->internalHandle.win32.handle == nullptr) {
5670  common::PushError("Thread handle for index '%d' are not allowed to be null", index);
5671  return false;
5672  }
5673  HANDLE handle = context->internalHandle.win32.handle;
5674  threadHandles[index] = handle;
5675  }
5676  DWORD code = ::WaitForMultipleObjects(count, threadHandles, waitForAll ? TRUE : FALSE, maxMilliseconds < UINT32_MAX ? maxMilliseconds : INFINITE);
5677  bool result = (code != WAIT_TIMEOUT) && (code != WAIT_FAILED);
5678  return(result);
5679  }
5680 
5681  fpl_internal bool Win32SignalWaitForMultiple(threading::ThreadSignal *signals[], const uint32_t count, const bool waitForAll, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
5682  if(signals == nullptr) {
5683  common::PushError("Signals parameter are not allowed to be null");
5684  return false;
5685  }
5686  if(count > common::MAX_SIGNAL_COUNT) {
5687  common::PushError("Count parameter '%d' must be less or equal than '%d'", count, common::MAX_SIGNAL_COUNT);
5688  return false;
5689  }
5690  HANDLE signalHandles[common::MAX_SIGNAL_COUNT];
5691  for(uint32_t index = 0; index < count; ++index) {
5692  threading::ThreadSignal *availableSignal = signals[index];
5693  if(availableSignal == nullptr) {
5694  common::PushError("Signal for index '%d' are not allowed to be null", index);
5695  return false;
5696  }
5697  if(availableSignal->internalHandle.win32.eventHandle == nullptr) {
5698  common::PushError("Signal handle for index '%d' are not allowed to be null", index);
5699  return false;
5700  }
5701  HANDLE handle = availableSignal->internalHandle.win32.eventHandle;
5702  signalHandles[index] = handle;
5703  }
5704  DWORD code = ::WaitForMultipleObjects(count, signalHandles, waitForAll ? TRUE : FALSE, maxMilliseconds < UINT32_MAX ? maxMilliseconds : INFINITE);
5705  bool result = (code != WAIT_TIMEOUT) && (code != WAIT_FAILED);
5706  return(result);
5707  }
5708 
5709  fpl_internal void Win32ReleasePlatform(PlatformInitState &initState, PlatformAppState *appState) {
5710  FPL_ASSERT(appState != nullptr);
5711  Win32AppState &win32AppState = appState->win32;
5712  Settings &currentSettings = appState->currentSettings;
5713  Win32InitState &win32InitState = initState.win32;
5714 
5715  Win32UnloadXInput(win32AppState.xinput);
5716 
5717  Win32UnloadAPI(win32AppState.winApi);
5718  }
5719 
5720  fpl_internal bool Win32InitPlatform(const InitFlags initFlags, const Settings &initSettings, PlatformInitState &initState, PlatformAppState *appState) {
5721  Win32InitState &win32InitState = initState.win32;
5722  win32InitState.appInstance = ::GetModuleHandleA(nullptr);
5723 
5724  FPL_ASSERT(appState != nullptr);
5725  Win32AppState &win32AppState = appState->win32;
5726 
5727  // @NOTE(final): Expect kernel32.lib to be linked always, so VirtualAlloc and LoadLibrary will always work.
5728 
5729  // Timing
5730  ::QueryPerformanceFrequency(&win32InitState.performanceFrequency);
5731 
5732  // Get main thread infos
5733  HANDLE mainThreadHandle = ::GetCurrentThread();
5734  DWORD mainThreadHandleId = ::GetCurrentThreadId();
5735  threading::ThreadContext *context = &common::global__ThreadState.mainThread;
5736  *context = {};
5737  context->id = mainThreadHandleId;
5738  context->internalHandle.win32.handle = mainThreadHandle;
5739  context->currentState = threading::ThreadState::Running;
5740 
5741  // Load windows api library
5742  if(!Win32LoadAPI(win32AppState.winApi)) {
5743  // @NOTE(final): Assume that errors are pushed on already.
5744  Win32ReleasePlatform(initState, appState);
5745  return false;
5746  }
5747 
5748  // Load XInput
5749  Win32LoadXInput(win32AppState.xinput);
5750 
5751  return (true);
5752  }
5753 
5754  } // platform
5755 
5756  //
5757  // Win32 Atomics
5758  //
5759  namespace atomics {
5760  fpl_platform_api void AtomicReadFence() {
5761  FPL_MEMORY_BARRIER();
5762  ::_ReadBarrier();
5763  }
5764  fpl_platform_api void AtomicWriteFence() {
5765  FPL_MEMORY_BARRIER();
5766  ::_WriteBarrier();
5767  }
5768  fpl_platform_api void AtomicReadWriteFence() {
5769  FPL_MEMORY_BARRIER();
5770  ::_ReadWriteBarrier();
5771  }
5772 
5773  fpl_platform_api uint32_t AtomicExchangeU32(volatile uint32_t *target, const uint32_t value) {
5774  FPL_ASSERT(target != nullptr);
5775  uint32_t result = ::_InterlockedExchange((volatile unsigned long *)target, value);
5776  return (result);
5777  }
5778  fpl_platform_api int32_t AtomicExchangeS32(volatile int32_t *target, const int32_t value) {
5779  FPL_ASSERT(target != nullptr);
5780  int32_t result = ::_InterlockedExchange((volatile long *)target, value);
5781  return (result);
5782  }
5783  fpl_platform_api uint64_t AtomicExchangeU64(volatile uint64_t *target, const uint64_t value) {
5784  FPL_ASSERT(target != nullptr);
5785  uint64_t result = ::_InterlockedExchange((volatile unsigned __int64 *)target, value);
5786  return (result);
5787  }
5788  fpl_platform_api int64_t AtomicExchangeS64(volatile int64_t *target, const int64_t value) {
5789  FPL_ASSERT(target != nullptr);
5790 # if defined(FPL_ARCH_X64)
5791  int64_t result = ::_InterlockedExchange64((volatile long long *)target, value);
5792 # else
5793  // @NOTE(final): Why does MSVC have no _InterlockedExchange64 on x86???
5794  int64_t result = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange64((volatile long long *)target, value, value);
5795 # endif
5796  return (result);
5797  }
5798 
5799  fpl_platform_api uint32_t AtomicAddU32(volatile uint32_t *value, const uint32_t addend) {
5800  FPL_ASSERT(value != nullptr);
5801  uint32_t result = ::_InterlockedExchangeAdd((volatile unsigned long *)value, addend);
5802  return (result);
5803  }
5804  fpl_platform_api int32_t AtomicAddS32(volatile int32_t *value, const int32_t addend) {
5805  FPL_ASSERT(value != nullptr);
5806  int32_t result = ::_InterlockedExchangeAdd((volatile long *)value, addend);
5807  return (result);
5808  }
5809  fpl_platform_api uint64_t AtomicAddU64(volatile uint64_t *value, const uint64_t addend) {
5810  FPL_ASSERT(value != nullptr);
5811  uint64_t result = ::_InterlockedExchangeAdd((volatile unsigned __int64 *)value, addend);
5812  return (result);
5813  }
5814  fpl_platform_api int64_t AtomicAddS64(volatile int64_t *value, const int64_t addend) {
5815  FPL_ASSERT(value != nullptr);
5816 # if defined(FPL_ARCH_X64)
5817  int64_t result = ::_InterlockedExchangeAdd64((volatile long long *)value, addend);
5818 # else
5819  // @NOTE(final): Why does MSVC have no _InterlockedExchangeAdd64 on x86???
5820  int64_t oldValue = AtomicLoadS64(value);
5821  int64_t newValue = oldValue + addend;
5822  int64_t result = oldValue;
5823  AtomicStoreS64(value, newValue);
5824 # endif
5825  return (result);
5826  }
5827 
5828  fpl_platform_api uint32_t AtomicCompareAndExchangeU32(volatile uint32_t *dest, const uint32_t comparand, const uint32_t exchange) {
5829  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
5830  uint32_t result = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile unsigned long *)dest, exchange, comparand);
5831  return (result);
5832  }
5833  fpl_platform_api int32_t AtomicCompareAndExchangeS32(volatile int32_t *dest, const int32_t comparand, const int32_t exchange) {
5834  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
5835  int32_t result = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile long *)dest, exchange, comparand);
5836  return (result);
5837  }
5838  fpl_platform_api uint64_t AtomicCompareAndExchangeU64(volatile uint64_t *dest, const uint64_t comparand, const uint64_t exchange) {
5839  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
5840  uint64_t result = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile unsigned __int64 *)dest, exchange, comparand);
5841  return (result);
5842  }
5843  fpl_platform_api int64_t AtomicCompareAndExchangeS64(volatile int64_t *dest, const int64_t comparand, const int64_t exchange) {
5844  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
5845  int64_t result = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange64((volatile long long *)dest, exchange, comparand);
5846  return (result);
5847  }
5848 
5849  fpl_platform_api bool IsAtomicCompareAndExchangeU32(volatile uint32_t *dest, const uint32_t comparand, const uint32_t exchange) {
5850  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
5851  uint32_t value = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile unsigned long *)dest, exchange, comparand);
5852  bool result = (value == comparand);
5853  return (result);
5854  }
5855  fpl_platform_api bool IsAtomicCompareAndExchangeS32(volatile int32_t *dest, const int32_t comparand, const int32_t exchange) {
5856  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
5857  int32_t value = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile long *)dest, exchange, comparand);
5858  bool result = (value == comparand);
5859  return (result);
5860  }
5861  fpl_platform_api bool IsAtomicCompareAndExchangeU64(volatile uint64_t *dest, const uint64_t comparand, const uint64_t exchange) {
5862  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
5863  uint64_t value = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile unsigned __int64 *)dest, exchange, comparand);
5864  bool result = (value == comparand);
5865  return (result);
5866  }
5867  fpl_platform_api bool IsAtomicCompareAndExchangeS64(volatile int64_t *dest, const int64_t comparand, const int64_t exchange) {
5868  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
5869  int64_t value = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange64((volatile long long *)dest, exchange, comparand);
5870  bool result = (value == comparand);
5871  return (result);
5872  }
5873 
5874  fpl_platform_api uint32_t AtomicLoadU32(volatile uint32_t *source) {
5875  uint32_t result = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile unsigned long *)source, 0, 0);
5876  return(result);
5877  }
5878  fpl_platform_api uint64_t AtomicLoadU64(volatile uint64_t *source) {
5879  uint64_t result = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile unsigned __int64 *)source, 0, 0);
5880  return(result);
5881  }
5882  fpl_platform_api int32_t AtomicLoadS32(volatile int32_t *source) {
5883  int32_t result = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange((volatile long *)source, 0, 0);
5884  return(result);
5885  }
5886  fpl_platform_api int64_t AtomicLoadS64(volatile int64_t *source) {
5887  int64_t result = ::_InterlockedCompareExchange64((volatile __int64 *)source, 0, 0);
5888  return(result);
5889  }
5890 
5891  fpl_platform_api void AtomicStoreU32(volatile uint32_t *dest, const uint32_t value) {
5892  ::_InterlockedExchange((volatile unsigned long *)dest, value);
5893  }
5894  fpl_platform_api void AtomicStoreU64(volatile uint64_t *dest, const uint64_t value) {
5895  ::_InterlockedExchange((volatile unsigned __int64 *)dest, value);
5896  }
5897  fpl_platform_api void AtomicStoreS32(volatile int32_t *dest, const int32_t value) {
5898  ::_InterlockedExchange((volatile long *)dest, value);
5899  }
5900  fpl_platform_api void AtomicStoreS64(volatile int64_t *dest, const int64_t value) {
5901 # if defined(FPL_ARCH_X64)
5902  ::_InterlockedExchange64((volatile __int64 *)dest, value);
5903 # else
5904  // @NOTE(final): Why does MSVC have no _InterlockedExchange64 on x86???
5905  int64_t oldValue = AtomicLoadS64(dest);
5906  ::_InterlockedCompareExchange64((volatile __int64 *)dest, value, oldValue);
5907 # endif
5908  }
5909  } // atomics
5910 
5911  //
5912  // Win32 Hardware
5913  //
5914  namespace hardware {
5915  fpl_platform_api uint32_t GetProcessorCoreCount() {
5916  SYSTEM_INFO sysInfo = {};
5917  ::GetSystemInfo(&sysInfo);
5918  // @NOTE(final): For now this returns the number of logical processors, which is the actual core count in most cases.
5919  uint32_t result = sysInfo.dwNumberOfProcessors;
5920  return(result);
5921  }
5922 
5923  fpl_platform_api MemoryInfos GetSystemMemoryInfos() {
5924  MemoryInfos result = {};
5925  MEMORYSTATUSEX statex = {};
5926  statex.dwLength = sizeof(statex);
5927  ULONGLONG totalMemorySize;
5928  if(::GetPhysicallyInstalledSystemMemory(&totalMemorySize) && ::GlobalMemoryStatusEx(&statex)) {
5929  result.totalPhysicalSize = totalMemorySize * 1024ull;
5930  result.availablePhysicalSize = statex.ullTotalPhys;
5931  result.usedPhysicalSize = result.availablePhysicalSize - statex.ullAvailPhys;
5932  result.totalVirtualSize = statex.ullTotalVirtual;
5933  result.usedVirtualSize = result.totalVirtualSize - statex.ullAvailVirtual;
5934  result.totalPageSize = statex.ullTotalPageFile;
5935  result.usedPageSize = result.totalPageSize - statex.ullAvailPageFile;
5936  }
5937  return(result);
5938  }
5939 
5940  fpl_platform_api char *GetProcessorName(char *destBuffer, const uint32_t maxDestBufferLen) {
5941  fpl_constant uint32_t CPU_BRAND_BUFFER_SIZE = 0x40;
5942 
5943  if(destBuffer == nullptr) {
5944  common::PushError("Dest buffer parameter are not allowed to be null");
5945  return nullptr;
5946  }
5947  if(maxDestBufferLen < (CPU_BRAND_BUFFER_SIZE + 1)) {
5948  common::PushError("Max dest buffer len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxDestBufferLen, CPU_BRAND_BUFFER_SIZE + 1);
5949  return nullptr;
5950  }
5951 
5952  // @TODO(final): __cpuid may not be available on other Win32 Compilers!
5953 
5954  int cpuInfo[4] = { -1 };
5955  char cpuBrandBuffer[CPU_BRAND_BUFFER_SIZE] = {};
5956  ::__cpuid(cpuInfo, 0x80000000);
5957  uint32_t extendedIds = cpuInfo[0];
5958 
5959  // Get the information associated with each extended ID. Interpret CPU brand string.
5960  uint32_t max = FPL_MIN(extendedIds, 0x80000004);
5961  for(uint32_t i = 0x80000002; i <= max; ++i) {
5962  ::__cpuid(cpuInfo, i);
5963  uint32_t offset = (i - 0x80000002) << 4;
5964  memory::MemoryCopy(cpuInfo, sizeof(cpuInfo), cpuBrandBuffer + offset);
5965  }
5966 
5967  // Copy result back to the dest buffer
5968  uint32_t sourceLen = strings::GetAnsiStringLength(cpuBrandBuffer);
5969  strings::CopyAnsiString(cpuBrandBuffer, sourceLen, destBuffer, maxDestBufferLen);
5970 
5971  return(destBuffer);
5972  }
5973  } // hardware
5974 
5975  //
5976  // Win32 Console
5977  //
5978  namespace console {
5979  fpl_platform_api void ConsoleOut(const char *text) {
5980  if(text != nullptr) {
5981  ::fprintf(stdout, text);
5982  }
5983  }
5984  fpl_platform_api void ConsoleFormatOut(const char *format, ...) {
5985  if(format != nullptr) {
5986  va_list vaList;
5987  va_start(vaList, format);
5988  ::vfprintf(stdout, format, vaList);
5989  va_end(vaList);
5990  }
5991  }
5992  fpl_platform_api void ConsoleError(const char *text) {
5993  if(text != nullptr) {
5994  ::fprintf(stderr, "%s", text);
5995  }
5996  }
5997  fpl_platform_api void ConsoleFormatError(const char *format, ...) {
5998  if(format != nullptr) {
5999  va_list vaList;
6000  va_start(vaList, format);
6001  ::vfprintf(stderr, format, vaList);
6002  va_end(vaList);
6003  }
6004  }
6005  fpl_platform_api const char ConsoleWaitForCharInput() {
6006  int c = ::getchar();
6007  const char result = (c >= 0 && c < 256) ? (char)c : 0;
6008  return(result);
6009  }
6010  }
6011 
6012  //
6013  // Win32 Threading
6014  //
6015  namespace threading {
6016  fpl_internal DWORD WINAPI Win32ThreadProc(void *data) {
6017  ThreadContext *context = (ThreadContext *)data;
6018  FPL_ASSERT(context != nullptr);
6019  atomics::AtomicStoreU32((volatile uint32_t *)&context->currentState, (uint32_t)ThreadState::Running);
6020  DWORD result = 0;
6021  if(context->runFunc != nullptr) {
6022  context->runFunc(*context, context->data);
6023  }
6024  atomics::AtomicStoreU32((volatile uint32_t *)&context->currentState, (uint32_t)ThreadState::Stopped);
6025  return(result);
6026  }
6027 
6028  fpl_platform_api ThreadContext *ThreadCreate(run_thread_function *runFunc, void *data) {
6029  ThreadContext *result = nullptr;
6030  ThreadContext *context = common::GetFreeThreadContext();
6031  if(context != nullptr) {
6032  DWORD creationFlags = 0;
6033  DWORD threadId = 0;
6034  context->data = data;
6035  context->runFunc = runFunc;
6036  context->currentState = ThreadState::Starting;
6037  HANDLE handle = ::CreateThread(nullptr, 0, Win32ThreadProc, context, creationFlags, &threadId);
6038  if(handle != nullptr) {
6039  context->isValid = true;
6040  context->id = threadId;
6041  context->internalHandle.win32.handle = handle;
6042  result = context;
6043  } else {
6044  common::PushError("Failed creating thread, error code: %d", GetLastError());
6045  }
6046  } else {
6047  common::PushError("All %d threads are in use, you cannot create until you free one", common::MAX_THREAD_COUNT);
6048  }
6049  return(result);
6050  }
6051 
6052  fpl_platform_api void ThreadSleep(const uint32_t milliseconds) {
6053  ::Sleep((DWORD)milliseconds);
6054  }
6055 
6056  fpl_platform_api void ThreadDestroy(ThreadContext *context) {
6057  if(context == nullptr) {
6058  common::PushError("Context parameter are not allowed to be null");
6059  return;
6060  }
6061  if(context->internalHandle.win32.handle == nullptr) {
6062  common::PushError("Thread context handle are not allowed to be null");
6063  return;
6064  }
6065  atomics::AtomicStoreU32((volatile uint32_t *)&context->currentState, (uint32_t)ThreadState::Stopping);
6066  HANDLE handle = context->internalHandle.win32.handle;
6067  ::TerminateThread(handle, 0);
6068  ::CloseHandle(handle);
6069  atomics::AtomicStoreU32((volatile uint32_t *)&context->currentState, (uint32_t)ThreadState::Stopped);
6070  *context = {};
6071  }
6072 
6073  fpl_platform_api bool ThreadWaitForOne(ThreadContext *context, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
6074  if(context == nullptr) {
6075  common::PushError("Context parameter are not allowed to be null");
6076  return false;
6077  }
6078  if(context->internalHandle.win32.handle == nullptr) {
6079  common::PushError("Thread context handle are not allowed to be null");
6080  return false;
6081  }
6082  HANDLE handle = context->internalHandle.win32.handle;
6083  bool result = (::WaitForSingleObject(handle, maxMilliseconds < UINT32_MAX ? maxMilliseconds : INFINITE) == WAIT_OBJECT_0);
6084  return(result);
6085  }
6086 
6087  fpl_platform_api bool ThreadWaitForAll(ThreadContext *contexts[], const uint32_t count, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
6088  bool result = platform::Win32ThreadWaitForMultiple(contexts, count, true, maxMilliseconds);
6089  return(result);
6090  }
6091 
6092  fpl_platform_api bool ThreadWaitForAny(ThreadContext *contexts[], const uint32_t count, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
6093  bool result = platform::Win32ThreadWaitForMultiple(contexts, count, false, maxMilliseconds);
6094  return(result);
6095  }
6096 
6097  fpl_platform_api ThreadMutex MutexCreate() {
6098  ThreadMutex result = {};
6099  ::InitializeCriticalSection(&result.internalHandle.win32.criticalSection);
6100  result.isValid = true;
6101  return(result);
6102  }
6103 
6104  fpl_platform_api void MutexDestroy(ThreadMutex &mutex) {
6105  if(mutex.isValid) {
6106  ::DeleteCriticalSection(&mutex.internalHandle.win32.criticalSection);
6107  }
6108  mutex = {};
6109  }
6110 
6111  fpl_platform_api bool MutexLock(ThreadMutex &mutex, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
6112  if(!mutex.isValid) {
6113  common::PushError("Mutex parameter must be valid");
6114  return false;
6115  }
6116  ::EnterCriticalSection(&mutex.internalHandle.win32.criticalSection);
6117  return true;
6118  }
6119 
6120  fpl_platform_api bool MutexUnlock(ThreadMutex &mutex) {
6121  if(!mutex.isValid) {
6122  common::PushError("Mutex parameter must be valid");
6123  return false;
6124  }
6125  ::LeaveCriticalSection(&mutex.internalHandle.win32.criticalSection);
6126  return true;
6127  }
6128 
6129  fpl_platform_api ThreadSignal SignalCreate() {
6130  ThreadSignal result = {};
6131  HANDLE handle = ::CreateEventA(nullptr, FALSE, FALSE, nullptr);
6132  if(handle != nullptr) {
6133  result.isValid = true;
6134  result.internalHandle.win32.eventHandle = handle;
6135  } else {
6136  common::PushError("Failed creating signal (Win32 event): %d", GetLastError());
6137  }
6138  return(result);
6139  }
6140 
6141  fpl_platform_api void SignalDestroy(ThreadSignal &signal) {
6142  if(signal.internalHandle.win32.eventHandle == nullptr) {
6143  common::PushError("Signal handle are not allowed to be null");
6144  return;
6145  }
6146  HANDLE handle = signal.internalHandle.win32.eventHandle;
6147  ::CloseHandle(handle);
6148  signal = {};
6149  }
6150 
6151  fpl_platform_api bool SignalWaitForOne(ThreadMutex &mutex, ThreadSignal &signal, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
6152  if(signal.internalHandle.win32.eventHandle == nullptr) {
6153  common::PushError("Signal handle are not allowed to be null");
6154  return false;
6155  }
6156  HANDLE handle = signal.internalHandle.win32.eventHandle;
6157  bool result = (::WaitForSingleObject(handle, maxMilliseconds < UINT32_MAX ? maxMilliseconds : INFINITE) == WAIT_OBJECT_0);
6158  return(result);
6159  }
6160 
6161  fpl_platform_api bool SignalWaitForAll(ThreadMutex &mutex, ThreadSignal *signals[], const uint32_t count, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
6162  bool result = platform::Win32SignalWaitForMultiple((ThreadSignal **)signals, count, true, maxMilliseconds);
6163  return(result);
6164  }
6165 
6166  fpl_platform_api bool SignalWaitForAny(ThreadMutex &mutex, ThreadSignal *signals[], const uint32_t count, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
6167  bool result = platform::Win32SignalWaitForMultiple((ThreadSignal **)signals, count, false, maxMilliseconds);
6168  return(result);
6169  }
6170 
6171  fpl_platform_api bool SignalSet(ThreadSignal &signal) {
6172  if(signal.internalHandle.win32.eventHandle == nullptr) {
6173  common::PushError("Signal handle are not allowed to be null");
6174  return false;
6175  }
6176  HANDLE handle = signal.internalHandle.win32.eventHandle;
6177  bool result = ::SetEvent(handle) == TRUE;
6178  return(result);
6179  }
6180 
6181  } // threading
6182 
6183  //
6184  // Win32 Memory
6185  //
6186  namespace memory {
6187  fpl_platform_api void *MemoryAllocate(const size_t size) {
6188  if(size == 0) {
6189  common::PushError("Size parameter must be greater than zero");
6190  return nullptr;
6191  }
6192  void *result = ::VirtualAlloc(0, size, MEM_RESERVE | MEM_COMMIT, PAGE_READWRITE);
6193  if(result == nullptr) {
6194  common::PushError("Failed allocating memory of %xu bytes", size);
6195  }
6196  return(result);
6197  }
6198 
6199  fpl_platform_api void MemoryFree(void *ptr) {
6200  if(ptr == nullptr) {
6201  common::PushError("Pointer parameter are not allowed to be null");
6202  return;
6203  }
6204  ::VirtualFree(ptr, 0, MEM_FREE);
6205  }
6206 
6207  fpl_platform_api void *MemoryStackAllocate(const size_t size) {
6208  if(size == 0) {
6209  common::PushError("Size parameter must be greater than zero");
6210  return nullptr;
6211  }
6212  void *result = _malloca(size);
6213  return(result);
6214  }
6215  } // memory
6216 
6217  //
6218  // Win32 Files
6219  //
6220  namespace files {
6221  fpl_platform_api FileHandle OpenBinaryFile(const char *filePath) {
6222  FileHandle result = {};
6223  if(filePath != nullptr) {
6224  HANDLE win32FileHandle = ::CreateFileA(filePath, GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ, nullptr, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, nullptr);
6225  if(win32FileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6226  result.isValid = true;
6227  result.internalHandle.win32.handle = (void *)win32FileHandle;
6228  }
6229  }
6230  return(result);
6231  }
6232  fpl_platform_api FileHandle OpenBinaryFile(const wchar_t *filePath) {
6233  FileHandle result = {};
6234  if(filePath != nullptr) {
6235  HANDLE win32FileHandle = ::CreateFileW(filePath, GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ, nullptr, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, nullptr);
6236  if(win32FileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6237  result.isValid = true;
6238  result.internalHandle.win32.handle = (void *)win32FileHandle;
6239  }
6240  }
6241  return(result);
6242  }
6243 
6244  fpl_platform_api FileHandle CreateBinaryFile(const char *filePath) {
6245  FileHandle result = {};
6246  if(filePath != nullptr) {
6247  HANDLE win32FileHandle = ::CreateFileA(filePath, GENERIC_WRITE, FILE_SHARE_WRITE, nullptr, CREATE_ALWAYS, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, nullptr);
6248  if(win32FileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6249  result.isValid = true;
6250  result.internalHandle.win32.handle = (void *)win32FileHandle;
6251  }
6252  }
6253  return(result);
6254  }
6255  fpl_platform_api FileHandle CreateBinaryFile(const wchar_t *filePath) {
6256  FileHandle result = {};
6257  if(filePath != nullptr) {
6258  HANDLE win32FileHandle = ::CreateFileW(filePath, GENERIC_WRITE, FILE_SHARE_WRITE, nullptr, CREATE_ALWAYS, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, nullptr);
6259  if(win32FileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6260  result.isValid = true;
6261  result.internalHandle.win32.handle = (void *)win32FileHandle;
6262  }
6263  }
6264  return(result);
6265  }
6266 
6267  fpl_platform_api uint32_t ReadFileBlock32(const FileHandle &fileHandle, const uint32_t sizeToRead, void *targetBuffer, const uint32_t maxTargetBufferSize) {
6268  if(sizeToRead == 0) {
6269  return 0;
6270  }
6271  if(targetBuffer == nullptr) {
6272  common::PushError("Target buffer parameter are now allowed to be null");
6273  return 0;
6274  }
6275  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle == nullptr) {
6276  common::PushError("File handle is not opened for reading");
6277  return 0;
6278  }
6279  uint32_t result = 0;
6280  HANDLE win32FileHandle = (HANDLE)fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle;
6281  DWORD bytesRead = 0;
6282  if(::ReadFile(win32FileHandle, targetBuffer, (DWORD)sizeToRead, &bytesRead, nullptr) == TRUE) {
6283  result = bytesRead;
6284  }
6285  return(result);
6286  }
6287 
6288  fpl_platform_api uint32_t WriteFileBlock32(const FileHandle &fileHandle, void *sourceBuffer, const uint32_t sourceSize) {
6289  if(sourceSize == 0) {
6290  common::PushError("Source size parameter must be greater than zero");
6291  return 0;
6292  }
6293  if(sourceBuffer == nullptr) {
6294  common::PushError("Source buffer parameter are now allowed to be null");
6295  return 0;
6296  }
6297  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle == nullptr) {
6298  common::PushError("File handle is not opened for writing");
6299  return 0;
6300  }
6301  uint32_t result = 0;
6302  HANDLE win32FileHandle = (HANDLE)fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle;
6303  DWORD bytesWritten = 0;
6304  if(::WriteFile(win32FileHandle, sourceBuffer, (DWORD)sourceSize, &bytesWritten, nullptr) == TRUE) {
6305  result = bytesWritten;
6306  }
6307  return(result);
6308  }
6309 
6310  fpl_platform_api void SetFilePosition32(const FileHandle &fileHandle, const int32_t position, const FilePositionMode mode) {
6311  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6312  HANDLE win32FileHandle = (void *)fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle;
6313  DWORD moveMethod = FILE_BEGIN;
6314  if(mode == FilePositionMode::Current) {
6315  moveMethod = FILE_CURRENT;
6316  } else if(mode == FilePositionMode::End) {
6317  moveMethod = FILE_END;
6318  }
6319  ::SetFilePointer(win32FileHandle, (LONG)position, nullptr, moveMethod);
6320  }
6321  }
6322 
6323  fpl_platform_api uint32_t GetFilePosition32(const FileHandle &fileHandle) {
6324  uint32_t result = 0;
6325  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6326  HANDLE win32FileHandle = (void *)fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle;
6327  DWORD filePosition = ::SetFilePointer(win32FileHandle, 0L, nullptr, FILE_CURRENT);
6328  if(filePosition != INVALID_SET_FILE_POINTER) {
6329  result = filePosition;
6330  }
6331  }
6332  return(result);
6333  }
6334 
6335  fpl_platform_api void CloseFile(FileHandle &fileHandle) {
6336  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6337  HANDLE win32FileHandle = (void *)fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle;
6338  ::CloseHandle(win32FileHandle);
6339  fileHandle = {};
6340  }
6341  }
6342 
6343  fpl_platform_api uint32_t GetFileSize32(const char *filePath) {
6344  uint32_t result = 0;
6345  if(filePath != nullptr) {
6346  HANDLE win32FileHandle = ::CreateFileA(filePath, GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ, nullptr, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, nullptr);
6347  if(win32FileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6348  DWORD fileSize = ::GetFileSize(win32FileHandle, nullptr);
6349  result = fileSize;
6350  ::CloseHandle(win32FileHandle);
6351  }
6352  }
6353  return(result);
6354  }
6355 
6356  fpl_platform_api uint32_t GetFileSize32(const FileHandle &fileHandle) {
6357  uint32_t result = 0;
6358  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6359  HANDLE win32FileHandle = (void *)fileHandle.internalHandle.win32.handle;
6360  DWORD fileSize = ::GetFileSize(win32FileHandle, nullptr);
6361  result = fileSize;
6362  }
6363  return(result);
6364  }
6365 
6366  fpl_platform_api bool FileExists(const char *filePath) {
6367  bool result = false;
6368  if(filePath != nullptr) {
6369  WIN32_FIND_DATAA findData;
6370  HANDLE searchHandle = ::FindFirstFileA(filePath, &findData);
6371  if(searchHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6372  result = !(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY);
6373  ::FindClose(searchHandle);
6374  }
6375  }
6376  return(result);
6377  }
6378 
6379  fpl_platform_api bool FileCopy(const char *sourceFilePath, const char *targetFilePath, const bool overwrite) {
6380  if(sourceFilePath == nullptr) {
6381  common::PushError("Source file path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6382  return false;
6383  }
6384  if(targetFilePath == nullptr) {
6385  common::PushError("Target file path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6386  return false;
6387  }
6388  bool result = (::CopyFileA(sourceFilePath, targetFilePath, !overwrite) == TRUE);
6389  return(result);
6390  }
6391 
6392  fpl_platform_api bool FileMove(const char *sourceFilePath, const char *targetFilePath) {
6393  if(sourceFilePath == nullptr) {
6394  common::PushError("Source file path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6395  return false;
6396  }
6397  if(targetFilePath == nullptr) {
6398  common::PushError("Target file path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6399  return false;
6400  }
6401  bool result = (::MoveFileA(sourceFilePath, targetFilePath) == TRUE);
6402  return(result);
6403  }
6404 
6405  fpl_platform_api bool FileDelete(const char *filePath) {
6406  if(filePath == nullptr) {
6407  common::PushError("File path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6408  return false;
6409  }
6410  bool result = (::DeleteFileA(filePath) == TRUE);
6411  return(result);
6412  }
6413 
6414  fpl_platform_api bool DirectoryExists(const char *path) {
6415  bool result = false;
6416  if(path != nullptr) {
6417  WIN32_FIND_DATAA findData;
6418  HANDLE searchHandle = ::FindFirstFileA(path, &findData);
6419  if(searchHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6420  result = (findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY) > 0;
6421  ::FindClose(searchHandle);
6422  }
6423  }
6424  return(result);
6425  }
6426 
6427  fpl_platform_api bool CreateDirectories(const char *path) {
6428  if(path == nullptr) {
6429  common::PushError("Path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6430  return false;
6431  }
6432  bool result = ::CreateDirectoryA(path, nullptr) > 0;
6433  return(result);
6434  }
6435  fpl_platform_api bool RemoveEmptyDirectory(const char *path) {
6436  if(path == nullptr) {
6437  common::PushError("Path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6438  return false;
6439  }
6440  bool result = ::RemoveDirectoryA(path) > 0;
6441  return(result);
6442  }
6443  fpl_internal_inline void Win32FillFileEntry(const WIN32_FIND_DATAA &findData, FileEntry &entry) {
6444  strings::CopyAnsiString(findData.cFileName, strings::GetAnsiStringLength(findData.cFileName), entry.path, FPL_ARRAYCOUNT(entry.path));
6445 
6446  entry.type = FileEntryType::Unknown;
6447  if(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY) {
6448  entry.type = FileEntryType::Directory;
6449  } else if(
6450  (findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL) ||
6451  (findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_HIDDEN) ||
6452  (findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_READONLY) ||
6453  (findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_ARCHIVE) ||
6454  (findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_SYSTEM)) {
6455  entry.type = FileEntryType::File;
6456  }
6457 
6458  entry.attributes = FileAttributeFlags::None;
6459  if(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL) {
6460  entry.attributes = FileAttributeFlags::Normal;
6461  } else {
6462  if(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_HIDDEN) {
6463  entry.attributes |= FileAttributeFlags::Hidden;
6464  }
6465  if(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_READONLY) {
6466  entry.attributes |= FileAttributeFlags::ReadOnly;
6467  }
6468  if(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_ARCHIVE) {
6469  entry.attributes |= FileAttributeFlags::Archive;
6470  }
6471  if(findData.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_SYSTEM) {
6472  entry.attributes |= FileAttributeFlags::System;
6473  }
6474  }
6475  }
6476  fpl_platform_api bool ListFilesBegin(const char *pathAndFilter, FileEntry &firstEntry) {
6477  if(pathAndFilter == nullptr) {
6478  return false;
6479  }
6480  bool result = false;
6481  WIN32_FIND_DATAA findData;
6482  HANDLE searchHandle = ::FindFirstFileA(pathAndFilter, &findData);
6483  if(searchHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6484  firstEntry = {};
6485  firstEntry.internalHandle.win32.fileHandle = searchHandle;
6486  Win32FillFileEntry(findData, firstEntry);
6487  result = true;
6488  }
6489  return(result);
6490  }
6491  fpl_platform_api bool ListFilesNext(FileEntry &nextEntry) {
6492  bool result = false;
6493  if(nextEntry.internalHandle.win32.fileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6494  HANDLE searchHandle = nextEntry.internalHandle.win32.fileHandle;
6495  WIN32_FIND_DATAA findData;
6496  if(::FindNextFileA(searchHandle, &findData)) {
6497  Win32FillFileEntry(findData, nextEntry);
6498  result = true;
6499  }
6500  }
6501  return(result);
6502  }
6503  fpl_platform_api void ListFilesEnd(FileEntry &lastEntry) {
6504  if(lastEntry.internalHandle.win32.fileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {
6505  HANDLE searchHandle = lastEntry.internalHandle.win32.fileHandle;
6506  ::FindClose(searchHandle);
6507  lastEntry = {};
6508  }
6509  }
6510  } // files
6511 
6512  //
6513  // Win32 Path/Directories
6514  //
6515  namespace paths {
6516 # if defined(UNICODE)
6517  fpl_platform_api char *GetExecutableFilePath(char *destPath, const uint32_t maxDestLen) {
6518  if(destPath == nullptr) {
6519  common::PushError("Dest path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6520  return nullptr;
6521  }
6522  if(maxDestLen < (MAX_PATH + 1)) {
6523  common::PushError("Max dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxDestLen, MAX_PATH + 1);
6524  return nullptr;
6525  }
6526  wchar_t modulePath[MAX_PATH];
6527  ::GetModuleFileNameW(nullptr, modulePath, MAX_PATH);
6528  strings::WideStringToAnsiString(modulePath, strings::GetWideStringLength(modulePath), destPath, maxDestLen);
6529  return(destPath);
6530  }
6531 # else
6532  fpl_platform_api char *GetExecutableFilePath(char *destPath, const uint32_t maxDestLen) {
6533  if(destPath == nullptr) {
6534  common::PushError("Dest path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6535  return nullptr;
6536  }
6537  if(maxDestLen < (MAX_PATH + 1)) {
6538  common::PushError("Max dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxDestLen, MAX_PATH + 1);
6539  return nullptr;
6540  }
6541  char modulePath[MAX_PATH];
6542  ::GetModuleFileNameA(nullptr, modulePath, MAX_PATH);
6543  strings::CopyAnsiString(modulePath, strings::GetAnsiStringLength(modulePath), destPath, maxDestLen);
6544  return(destPath);
6545  }
6546 # endif // UNICODE
6547 
6548 # if defined(UNICODE)
6549  fpl_platform_api char *GetHomePath(char *destPath, const uint32_t maxDestLen) {
6550  if(destPath == nullptr) {
6551  common::PushError("Dest path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6552  return nullptr;
6553  }
6554  if(maxDestLen < (MAX_PATH + 1)) {
6555  common::PushError("Max dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxDestLen, MAX_PATH + 1);
6556  return nullptr;
6557  }
6558  if(platform::global__AppState == nullptr) {
6559  common::PushError("Platform is not initialized");
6560  return nullptr;
6561  }
6562  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = platform::global__AppState->win32.winApi;
6563  wchar_t homePath[MAX_PATH];
6564  wapi.shell.shGetFolderPathW(nullptr, CSIDL_PROFILE, nullptr, 0, homePath);
6565  strings::WideStringToAnsiString(homePath, strings::GetWideStringLength(homePath), destPath, maxDestLen);
6566  return(destPath);
6567  }
6568 # else
6569  fpl_platform_api char *GetHomePath(char *destPath, const uint32_t maxDestLen) {
6570  if(destPath == nullptr) {
6571  common::PushError("Dest path parameter are not allowed to be null");
6572  return nullptr;
6573  }
6574  if(maxDestLen < (MAX_PATH + 1)) {
6575  common::PushError("Max dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxDestLen, MAX_PATH + 1);
6576  return nullptr;
6577  }
6578  if(platform::global__AppState == nullptr) {
6579  common::PushError("Platform is not initialized");
6580  return nullptr;
6581  }
6582  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = platform::global__AppState->win32.winApi;
6583  char homePath[MAX_PATH];
6584  wapi.shell.shGetFolderPathA(nullptr, CSIDL_PROFILE, nullptr, 0, homePath);
6585  strings::CopyAnsiString(homePath, strings::GetAnsiStringLength(homePath), destPath, maxDestLen);
6586  return(destPath);
6587  }
6588 # endif // UNICODE
6589  } // paths
6590 
6591  //
6592  // Win32 Timings
6593  //
6594  namespace timings {
6595  fpl_platform_api double GetHighResolutionTimeInSeconds() {
6596  const platform::Win32InitState &initState = platform::global__InitState.win32;
6597  LARGE_INTEGER time;
6598  ::QueryPerformanceCounter(&time);
6599  double result = time.QuadPart / (double)initState.performanceFrequency.QuadPart;
6600  return(result);
6601  }
6602 
6603  fpl_platform_api uint64_t GetTimeInMilliseconds() {
6604  uint64_t result = ::GetTickCount();
6605  return(result);
6606  }
6607  } // timings
6608 
6609  //
6610  // Win32 Strings
6611  //
6612  namespace strings {
6613  fpl_platform_api char *WideStringToAnsiString(const wchar_t *wideSource, const uint32_t maxWideSourceLen, char *ansiDest, const uint32_t maxAnsiDestLen) {
6614  if(wideSource == nullptr) {
6615  common::PushError("Wide source parameter are not allowed to be null");
6616  return nullptr;
6617  }
6618  if(ansiDest == nullptr) {
6619  common::PushError("Ansi dest parameter are not allowed to be null");
6620  return nullptr;
6621  }
6622  uint32_t requiredLen = ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_ACP, 0, wideSource, maxWideSourceLen, nullptr, 0, nullptr, nullptr);
6623  if(maxAnsiDestLen < (requiredLen + 1)) {
6624  common::PushError("Max ansi dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than ''", maxAnsiDestLen, (requiredLen + 1));
6625  return nullptr;
6626  }
6627  ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_ACP, 0, wideSource, maxWideSourceLen, ansiDest, maxAnsiDestLen, nullptr, nullptr);
6628  ansiDest[requiredLen] = 0;
6629  return(ansiDest);
6630  }
6631  fpl_platform_api char *WideStringToUTF8String(const wchar_t *wideSource, const uint32_t maxWideSourceLen, char *utf8Dest, const uint32_t maxUtf8DestLen) {
6632  if(wideSource == nullptr) {
6633  common::PushError("Wide source parameter are not allowed to be null");
6634  return nullptr;
6635  }
6636  if(utf8Dest == nullptr) {
6637  common::PushError("UTF8 dest parameter are not allowed to be null");
6638  return nullptr;
6639  }
6640  uint32_t requiredLen = ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, wideSource, maxWideSourceLen, nullptr, 0, nullptr, nullptr);
6641  if(maxUtf8DestLen < (requiredLen + 1)) {
6642  common::PushError("Max utf8 dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than ''", maxUtf8DestLen, (requiredLen + 1));
6643  return nullptr;
6644  }
6645  ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, wideSource, maxWideSourceLen, utf8Dest, maxUtf8DestLen, nullptr, nullptr);
6646  utf8Dest[requiredLen] = 0;
6647  return(utf8Dest);
6648  }
6649  fpl_platform_api wchar_t *AnsiStringToWideString(const char *ansiSource, const uint32_t ansiSourceLen, wchar_t *wideDest, const uint32_t maxWideDestLen) {
6650  if(ansiSource == nullptr) {
6651  common::PushError("Ansi source parameter are not allowed to be null");
6652  return nullptr;
6653  }
6654  if(wideDest == nullptr) {
6655  common::PushError("Wide dest parameter are not allowed to be null");
6656  return nullptr;
6657  }
6658  uint32_t requiredLen = ::MultiByteToWideChar(CP_ACP, 0, ansiSource, ansiSourceLen, nullptr, 0);
6659  if(maxWideDestLen < (requiredLen + 1)) {
6660  common::PushError("Max wide dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxWideDestLen, (requiredLen + 1));
6661  return nullptr;
6662  }
6663  ::MultiByteToWideChar(CP_ACP, 0, ansiSource, ansiSourceLen, wideDest, maxWideDestLen);
6664  wideDest[requiredLen] = 0;
6665  return(wideDest);
6666  }
6667  fpl_platform_api wchar_t *UTF8StringToWideString(const char *utf8Source, const uint32_t utf8SourceLen, wchar_t *wideDest, const uint32_t maxWideDestLen) {
6668  if(utf8Source == nullptr) {
6669  common::PushError("UTF8 source parameter are not allowed to be null");
6670  return nullptr;
6671  }
6672  if(wideDest == nullptr) {
6673  common::PushError("Wide dest parameter are not allowed to be null");
6674  return nullptr;
6675  }
6676  uint32_t requiredLen = ::MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, utf8Source, utf8SourceLen, nullptr, 0);
6677  if(maxWideDestLen < (requiredLen + 1)) {
6678  common::PushError("Max wide dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxWideDestLen, (requiredLen + 1));
6679  return nullptr;
6680  }
6681  ::MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, utf8Source, utf8SourceLen, wideDest, maxWideDestLen);
6682  wideDest[requiredLen] = 0;
6683  return(wideDest);
6684  }
6685  fpl_platform_api char *FormatAnsiString(char *ansiDestBuffer, const uint32_t maxAnsiDestBufferLen, const char *format, ...) {
6686  if(ansiDestBuffer == nullptr) {
6687  common::PushError("Ansi dest buffer parameter are not allowed to be null");
6688  return nullptr;
6689  }
6690  if(maxAnsiDestBufferLen == 0) {
6691  common::PushError("Max ansi dest len parameter must be greater that zero");
6692  return nullptr;
6693  }
6694  if(format == nullptr) {
6695  common::PushError("Format parameter are not allowed to be null");
6696  return nullptr;
6697  }
6698  va_list argList;
6699  va_start(argList, format);
6700  // @NOTE(final): Need to clear the first character, otherwise vsnprintf() does weird things... O_o
6701  ansiDestBuffer[0] = 0;
6702  int charCount = ::vsnprintf(ansiDestBuffer, maxAnsiDestBufferLen, format, argList);
6703  if(charCount < 0) {
6704  common::PushError("Format parameter are '%s' are invalid!", format);
6705  return nullptr;
6706  }
6707  if((int)maxAnsiDestBufferLen < (charCount + 1)) {
6708  common::PushError("Max ansi dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxAnsiDestBufferLen, (charCount + 1));
6709  return nullptr;
6710  }
6711  va_end(argList);
6712  FPL_ASSERT(charCount > 0);
6713  ansiDestBuffer[charCount] = 0;
6714  char *result = ansiDestBuffer;
6715  return(result);
6716  }
6717  } // strings
6718 
6719  //
6720  // Win32 Library
6721  //
6722  namespace library {
6723  fpl_platform_api DynamicLibraryHandle DynamicLibraryLoad(const char *libraryFilePath) {
6724  DynamicLibraryHandle result = {};
6725  if(libraryFilePath != nullptr) {
6726  HMODULE libModule = ::LoadLibraryA(libraryFilePath);
6727  if(libModule != nullptr) {
