6728  result.internalHandle.win32Handle = libModule;
6729  result.isValid = true;
6730  }
6731  }
6732  return(result);
6733  }
6734  fpl_platform_api void *GetDynamicLibraryProc(const DynamicLibraryHandle &handle, const char *name) {
6735  void *result = nullptr;
6736  if(handle.internalHandle.win32Handle != nullptr && name != nullptr) {
6737  HMODULE libModule = handle.internalHandle.win32Handle;
6738  result = (void *)::GetProcAddress(libModule, name);
6739  }
6740  return(result);
6741  }
6742  fpl_platform_api void DynamicLibraryUnload(DynamicLibraryHandle &handle) {
6743  if(handle.internalHandle.win32Handle != nullptr) {
6744  HMODULE libModule = (HMODULE)handle.internalHandle.win32Handle;
6745  ::FreeLibrary(libModule);
6746  handle = {};
6747  }
6748  }
6749  } // library
6750 
6751 #if defined(FPL_ENABLE_WINDOW)
6752  //
6753  // Win32 Window
6754  //
6755  namespace window {
6756  fpl_platform_api WindowSize GetWindowArea() {
6757  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6758  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
6759  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6760  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
6761  WindowSize result = {};
6762  RECT windowRect;
6763  if(wapi.user.getClientRect(windowState.windowHandle, &windowRect)) {
6764  result.width = windowRect.right - windowRect.left;
6765  result.height = windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top;
6766  }
6767  return(result);
6768  }
6769 
6770  fpl_platform_api void SetWindowArea(const uint32_t width, const uint32_t height) {
6771  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6772  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
6773  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6774  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
6775  RECT clientRect, windowRect;
6776  if(wapi.user.getClientRect(windowState.windowHandle, &clientRect) &&
6777  wapi.user.getWindowRect(windowState.windowHandle, &windowRect)) {
6778  int borderWidth = (windowRect.right - windowRect.left) - (clientRect.right - clientRect.left);
6779  int borderHeight = (windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top) - (clientRect.bottom - clientRect.top);
6780  int newWidth = width + borderWidth;
6781  int newHeight = height + borderHeight;
6782  wapi.user.setWindowPos(windowState.windowHandle, 0, 0, 0, newWidth, newHeight, SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOACTIVATE);
6783  }
6784  }
6785 
6786  fpl_platform_api bool IsWindowResizable() {
6787  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6788  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
6789  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6790  DWORD style = platform::win32_getWindowLong(windowState.windowHandle, GWL_STYLE);
6791  bool result = (style & WS_THICKFRAME) > 0;
6792  return(result);
6793  }
6794 
6795  fpl_platform_api void SetWindowResizeable(const bool value) {
6796  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6797  platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
6798  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = appState->window.win32;
6799  const platform::Win32AppState &win32State = appState->win32;
6800  if(!appState->currentSettings.window.isFullscreen) {
6801  DWORD style;
6802  DWORD exStyle;
6803  if(value) {
6804  style = platform::Win32ResizeableWindowStyle;
6805  exStyle = platform::Win32ResizeableWindowExtendedStyle;
6806  } else {
6807  style = platform::Win32NonResizableWindowStyle;
6808  exStyle = platform::Win32NonResizableWindowExtendedStyle;
6809  }
6810  platform::win32_setWindowLong(windowState.windowHandle, GWL_STYLE, style);
6811  platform::win32_setWindowLong(windowState.windowHandle, GWL_EXSTYLE, exStyle);
6812  appState->currentSettings.window.isResizable = value;
6813  }
6814  }
6815 
6816  fpl_platform_api bool IsWindowFullscreen() {
6817  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6818  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6819  HWND windowHandle = windowState.windowHandle;
6820  DWORD style = platform::win32_getWindowLong(windowHandle, GWL_STYLE);
6821  bool result = (style & platform::Win32FullscreenWindowStyle) > 0;
6822  return(result);
6823  }
6824 
6825  fpl_platform_api bool SetWindowFullscreen(const bool value, const uint32_t fullscreenWidth, const uint32_t fullscreenHeight, const uint32_t refreshRate) {
6826  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6827  platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
6828  platform::Win32AppState &win32AppState = appState->win32;
6829  platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = appState->window.win32;
6830  WindowSettings &windowSettings = appState->currentSettings.window;
6831  platform::Win32LastWindowInfo &fullscreenState = windowState.lastFullscreenInfo;
6832  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = win32AppState.winApi;
6833 
6834  HWND windowHandle = windowState.windowHandle;
6835 
6836  // Save current window info if not already fullscreen
6837  if(!windowSettings.isFullscreen) {
6838  fullscreenState.isMaximized = !!wapi.user.isZoomed(windowHandle);
6839  if(fullscreenState.isMaximized) {
6840  platform::win32_sendMessage(windowHandle, WM_SYSCOMMAND, SC_RESTORE, 0);
6841  }
6842  fullscreenState.style = platform::win32_getWindowLong(windowHandle, GWL_STYLE);
6843  fullscreenState.exStyle = platform::win32_getWindowLong(windowHandle, GWL_EXSTYLE);
6844  wapi.user.getWindowPlacement(windowHandle, &fullscreenState.placement);
6845  }
6846 
6847  if(value) {
6848  // Enter fullscreen mode or fallback to window mode
6849  windowSettings.isFullscreen = platform::Win32EnterFullscreen(fullscreenWidth, fullscreenHeight, refreshRate, 0);
6850  if(!windowSettings.isFullscreen) {
6851  platform::Win32LeaveFullscreen();
6852  }
6853  } else {
6854  platform::Win32LeaveFullscreen();
6855  windowSettings.isFullscreen = false;
6856  }
6857  return(windowSettings.isFullscreen);
6858  }
6859 
6860  fpl_platform_api WindowPosition GetWindowPosition() {
6861  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6862  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
6863  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6864  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
6865 
6866  WindowPosition result = {};
6867  WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {};
6868  placement.length = sizeof(WINDOWPLACEMENT);
6869  if(wapi.user.getWindowPlacement(windowState.windowHandle, &placement) == TRUE) {
6870  switch(placement.showCmd) {
6871  case SW_MAXIMIZE:
6872  {
6873  result.left = placement.ptMaxPosition.x;
6874  result.top = placement.ptMaxPosition.y;
6875  } break;
6876  case SW_MINIMIZE:
6877  {
6878  result.left = placement.ptMinPosition.x;
6879  result.top = placement.ptMinPosition.y;
6880  } break;
6881  default:
6882  {
6883  result.left = placement.rcNormalPosition.left;
6884  result.top = placement.rcNormalPosition.top;
6885  } break;
6886  }
6887  }
6888  return(result);
6889  }
6890 
6891  fpl_platform_api void SetWindowTitle(const char *title) {
6892  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6893  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
6894  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6895  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
6896 
6897  // @TODO(final): Add function for setting the unicode window title!
6898  HWND handle = windowState.windowHandle;
6899  wapi.user.setWindowTextA(handle, title);
6900  }
6901 
6902  fpl_platform_api void SetWindowPosition(const int32_t left, const int32_t top) {
6903  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6904  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
6905  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6906  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
6907 
6908  WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {};
6909  placement.length = sizeof(WINDOWPLACEMENT);
6910  RECT windowRect;
6911  if(wapi.user.getWindowPlacement(windowState.windowHandle, &placement) &&
6912  wapi.user.getWindowRect(windowState.windowHandle, &windowRect)) {
6913  switch(placement.showCmd) {
6914  case SW_NORMAL:
6915  case SW_SHOW:
6916  {
6917  placement.rcNormalPosition.left = left;
6918  placement.rcNormalPosition.top = top;
6919  placement.rcNormalPosition.right = placement.rcNormalPosition.left + (windowRect.right - windowRect.left);
6920  placement.rcNormalPosition.bottom = placement.rcNormalPosition.top + (windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top);
6921  wapi.user.setWindowPlacement(windowState.windowHandle, &placement);
6922  } break;
6923  }
6924  }
6925  }
6926 
6927  fpl_platform_api void SetWindowCursorEnabled(const bool value) {
6928  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6929  platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6930  windowState.isCursorActive = value;
6931  }
6932 
6933  fpl_platform_api bool PushWindowEvent() {
6934  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6935  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = platform::global__AppState->win32.winApi;
6936  bool result = false;
6937  MSG msg;
6938  BOOL R = platform::win32_peekMessage(&msg, nullptr, 0, 0, PM_REMOVE);
6939  if(R == TRUE) {
6940  wapi.user.translateMessage(&msg);
6941  platform::win32_dispatchMessage(&msg);
6942  result = true;
6943  }
6944  return (result);
6945  }
6946 
6947  fpl_platform_api void UpdateGameControllers() {
6948  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6949  platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
6950  platform::Win32AppState &win32AppState = appState->win32;
6951  const platform::Win32InitState &win32InitState = platform::global__InitState.win32;
6952  platform::Win32PollControllers(appState->currentSettings, win32InitState, win32AppState.xinput);
6953  }
6954 
6955  fpl_platform_api bool WindowUpdate() {
6956  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6957  platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
6958  platform::Win32AppState &win32AppState = appState->win32;
6959  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6960  const platform::Win32InitState &win32InitState = platform::global__InitState.win32;
6961  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = win32AppState.winApi;
6962 
6963  bool result = false;
6964 
6965  // Poll gamepad controller states
6966  platform::Win32PollControllers(appState->currentSettings, win32InitState, win32AppState.xinput);
6967 
6968  // Poll window events
6969  if(windowState.windowHandle != 0) {
6970  MSG msg;
6971  while(platform::win32_peekMessage(&msg, nullptr, 0, 0, PM_REMOVE) != 0) {
6972  wapi.user.translateMessage(&msg);
6973  platform::win32_dispatchMessage(&msg);
6974  }
6975  result = windowState.isRunning;
6976  }
6977 
6978  return(result);
6979  }
6980 
6981  fpl_platform_api bool IsWindowRunning() {
6982  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6983  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6984  bool result = windowState.isRunning;
6985  return(result);
6986  }
6987 
6988  fpl_platform_api char *GetClipboardAnsiText(char *dest, const uint32_t maxDestLen) {
6989  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
6990  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
6991  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
6992  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
6993  char *result = nullptr;
6994  if(wapi.user.openClipboard(windowState.windowHandle)) {
6995  if(wapi.user.isClipboardFormatAvailable(CF_TEXT)) {
6996  HGLOBAL dataHandle = wapi.user.getClipboardData(CF_TEXT);
6997  if(dataHandle != nullptr) {
6998  const char *stringValue = (const char *)GlobalLock(dataHandle);
6999  result = strings::CopyAnsiString(stringValue, dest, maxDestLen);
7000  GlobalUnlock(dataHandle);
7001  }
7002  }
7003  wapi.user.closeClipboard();
7004  }
7005  return(result);
7006  }
7007 
7008  fpl_platform_api wchar_t *GetClipboardWideText(wchar_t *dest, const uint32_t maxDestLen) {
7009  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
7010  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
7011  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
7012  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
7013  wchar_t *result = nullptr;
7014  if(wapi.user.openClipboard(windowState.windowHandle)) {
7015  if(wapi.user.isClipboardFormatAvailable(CF_UNICODETEXT)) {
7016  HGLOBAL dataHandle = wapi.user.getClipboardData(CF_UNICODETEXT);
7017  if(dataHandle != nullptr) {
7018  const wchar_t *stringValue = (const wchar_t *)GlobalLock(dataHandle);
7019  result = strings::CopyWideString(stringValue, dest, maxDestLen);
7020  GlobalUnlock(dataHandle);
7021  }
7022  }
7023  wapi.user.closeClipboard();
7024  }
7025  return(result);
7026  }
7027 
7028  fpl_platform_api bool SetClipboardText(const char *ansiSource) {
7029  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
7030  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
7031  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
7032  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
7033  bool result = false;
7034  if(wapi.user.openClipboard(windowState.windowHandle)) {
7035  const uint32_t ansiLen = strings::GetAnsiStringLength(ansiSource);
7036  const uint32_t ansiBufferLen = ansiLen + 1;
7037  HGLOBAL handle = GlobalAlloc(GMEM_MOVEABLE, (SIZE_T)ansiBufferLen * sizeof(char));
7038  if(handle != nullptr) {
7039  char *target = (char*)GlobalLock(handle);
7040  strings::CopyAnsiString(ansiSource, ansiLen, target, ansiBufferLen);
7041  GlobalUnlock(handle);
7042  wapi.user.emptyClipboard();
7043  wapi.user.setClipboardData(CF_TEXT, handle);
7044  result = true;
7045  }
7046  wapi.user.closeClipboard();
7047  }
7048  return(result);
7049  }
7050 
7051  fpl_platform_api bool SetClipboardText(const wchar_t *wideSource) {
7052  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
7053  const platform::Win32AppState &appState = platform::global__AppState->win32;
7054  const platform::Win32WindowState &windowState = platform::global__AppState->window.win32;
7055  const platform::Win32APIFunctions &wapi = appState.winApi;
7056  bool result = false;
7057  if(wapi.user.openClipboard(windowState.windowHandle)) {
7058  const uint32_t wideLen = strings::GetWideStringLength(wideSource);
7059  const uint32_t wideBufferLen = wideLen + 1;
7060  HGLOBAL handle = GlobalAlloc(GMEM_MOVEABLE, (SIZE_T)wideBufferLen * sizeof(wchar_t));
7061  if(handle != nullptr) {
7062  wchar_t *wideTarget = (wchar_t*)GlobalLock(handle);
7063  strings::CopyWideString(wideSource, wideLen, wideTarget, wideBufferLen);
7064  GlobalUnlock(handle);
7065  wapi.user.emptyClipboard();
7066  wapi.user.setClipboardData(CF_UNICODETEXT, handle);
7067  result = true;
7068  }
7069  wapi.user.closeClipboard();
7070  }
7071  return(result);
7072  }
7073  } // window
7074 #endif // FPL_ENABLE_WINDOW
7075 
7076 } // fpl
7077 
7078 # if defined(FPL_ENABLE_WINDOW)
7079 
7080 # if defined(UNICODE)
7081 
7082 int WINAPI wWinMain(HINSTANCE appInstance, HINSTANCE prevInstance, LPWSTR cmdLine, int cmdShow) {
7083  fpl::platform::Win32CommandLineUTF8Arguments args = fpl::platform::Win32ParseWideArguments(cmdLine);
7084  int result = main(args.count, args.args);
7085  fpl::memory::MemoryFree(args.mem);
7086  return(result);
7087 }
7088 
7089 # else
7090 
7091 int WINAPI WinMain(HINSTANCE appInstance, HINSTANCE prevInstance, LPSTR cmdLine, int cmdShow) {
7092  fpl::platform::Win32CommandLineUTF8Arguments args = fpl::platform::Win32ParseAnsiArguments(cmdLine);
7093  int result = main(args.count, args.args);
7094  fpl::memory::MemoryFree(args.mem);
7095  return(result);
7096 }
7097 # endif // UNICODE
7098 
7099 # endif // FPL_ENABLE_WINDOW
7100 
7101 #endif // FPL_PLATFORM_WIN32
7102 
7103 // ****************************************************************************
7104 //
7105 // POSIX Sub-Platform (Linux, Unix)
7106 //
7107 // ****************************************************************************
7108 #if defined(FPL_SUBPLATFORM_POSIX)
7109 #include <sys/mman.h> // mmap, munmap
7110 #include <sys/types.h> // data types
7111 #include <sys/stat.h> // mkdir
7112 #include <sys/errno.h> // errno
7113 #include <signal.h> // pthread_kill
7114 #include <stdlib.h> // wcstombs, mbstowcs
7115 #include <time.h> // clock_gettime, nanosleep
7116 #include <dlfcn.h> // dlopen, dlclose
7117 #include <fcntl.h> // open
7118 #include <unistd.h> // read, write, close, access, rmdir
7119 
7120  // @NOTE(final): Little macro to not write 5 lines of code all the time
7121 # define FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, target, type, name) \
7122  target = (type *)dlsym(libHandle, name); \
7123  if (target == nullptr) { \
7124  fpl::common::PushError("Failed getting '%s' from library '%s'", name, libName); \
7125  return false; \
7126  }
7127 
7128 namespace fpl {
7129  //
7130  // POSIX Platform
7131  //
7132  namespace platform {
7133  fpl_internal bool LoadPThreadAPI(PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI) {
7134  const char* libpthreadFileNames[] = {
7135  "libpthread.so",
7136  "libpthread.so.0",
7137  };
7138  pthreadAPI = {};
7139  const char *libName = nullptr;
7140  void *libHandle = nullptr;
7141  for(uint32_t index = 0; index < FPL_ARRAYCOUNT(libpthreadFileNames); ++index) {
7142  libName = libpthreadFileNames[index];
7143  libHandle = dlopen(libName, RTLD_NOW);
7144  if(libHandle != nullptr) {
7145  break;
7146  }
7147  }
7148  if(libHandle == nullptr) {
7149  return false;
7150  }
7151 
7152  // pthread_t
7153  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_create, pthread_func_pthread_create, "pthread_create");
7154  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_kill, pthread_func_pthread_kill, "pthread_kill");
7155  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_join, pthread_func_pthread_join, "pthread_join");
7156  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_exit, pthread_func_pthread_exit, "pthread_exit");
7157  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_yield, pthread_func_pthread_yield, "pthread_yield");
7158 
7159  // pthread_mutex_t
7160  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_init, pthread_func_pthread_mutex_init, "pthread_mutex_init");
7161  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_destroy, pthread_func_pthread_mutex_destroy, "pthread_mutex_destroy");
7162  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_lock, pthread_func_pthread_mutex_lock, "pthread_mutex_lock");
7163  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_trylock, pthread_func_pthread_mutex_trylock, "pthread_mutex_trylock");
7164  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_unlock, pthread_func_pthread_mutex_unlock, "pthread_mutex_unlock");
7165 
7166  // pthread_cond_t
7167  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_init, pthread_func_pthread_cond_init, "pthread_cond_init");
7168  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_destroy, pthread_func_pthread_cond_destroy, "pthread_cond_destroy");
7169  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_timedwait, pthread_func_pthread_cond_timedwait, "pthread_cond_timedwait");
7170  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_wait, pthread_func_pthread_cond_wait, "pthread_cond_wait");
7171  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_broadcast, pthread_func_pthread_cond_broadcast, "pthread_cond_broadcast");
7172  FPL_DL_GET_FUNCTION_ADDRESS(libHandle, libName, pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_signal, pthread_func_pthread_cond_signal, "pthread_cond_signal");
7173 
7174  pthreadAPI.libraryHandle = libHandle;
7175  return true;
7176  }
7177 
7178  fpl_internal void UnloadPThreadAPI(PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI) {
7179  if(pthreadAPI.libraryHandle != nullptr) {
7180  dlclose(pthreadAPI.libraryHandle);
7181  }
7182  pthreadAPI = {};
7183  }
7184 
7185  fpl_internal void POSIXReleasePlatform(POSIXAppState &appState) {
7186  UnloadPThreadAPI(appState.pthreadApi);
7187  }
7188 
7189  fpl_internal bool POSIXInitPlatform(const InitFlags initFlags, const Settings &initSettings, POSIXInitState &initState, POSIXAppState &appState) {
7190  if(!LoadPThreadAPI(appState.pthreadApi)) {
7191  common::PushError("Failed initializing PThread API");
7192  return false;
7193  }
7194  return true;
7195  }
7196  }
7197 
7198  //
7199  // POSIX Atomics
7200  //
7201  namespace atomics {
7202 # if defined(FPL_COMPILER_GCC)
7203  // @NOTE(final): See: https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc/_005f_005fsync-Builtins.html#g_t_005f_005fsync-Builtins
7204  fpl_platform_api void AtomicReadFence() {
7205  // @TODO(final): Wrong to ensure a full memory fence here!
7206  __sync_synchronize();
7207  }
7208  fpl_platform_api void AtomicWriteFence() {
7209  // @TODO(final): Wrong to ensure a full memory fence here!
7210  __sync_synchronize();
7211  }
7212  fpl_platform_api void AtomicReadWriteFence() {
7213  __sync_synchronize();
7214  }
7215 
7216  fpl_platform_api uint32_t AtomicExchangeU32(volatile uint32_t *target, const uint32_t value) {
7217  uint32_t result = __sync_lock_test_and_set(target, value);
7218  __sync_synchronize();
7219  return(result);
7220  }
7221  fpl_platform_api int32_t AtomicExchangeS32(volatile int32_t *target, const int32_t value) {
7222  int32_t result = __sync_lock_test_and_set(target, value);
7223  __sync_synchronize();
7224  return(result);
7225  }
7226  fpl_platform_api uint64_t AtomicExchangeU64(volatile uint64_t *target, const uint64_t value) {
7227  uint64_t result = __sync_lock_test_and_set(target, value);
7228  __sync_synchronize();
7229  return(result);
7230  }
7231  fpl_platform_api int64_t AtomicExchangeS64(volatile int64_t *target, const int64_t value) {
7232  int64_t result = __sync_lock_test_and_set(target, value);
7233  __sync_synchronize();
7234  return(result);
7235  }
7236 
7237  fpl_platform_api uint32_t AtomicAddU32(volatile uint32_t *value, const uint32_t addend) {
7238  FPL_ASSERT(value != nullptr);
7239  uint32_t result = __sync_fetch_and_add(value, addend);
7240  return (result);
7241  }
7242  fpl_platform_api int32_t AtomicAddS32(volatile int32_t *value, const int32_t addend) {
7243  FPL_ASSERT(value != nullptr);
7244  uint32_t result = __sync_fetch_and_add(value, addend);
7245  return (result);
7246  }
7247  fpl_platform_api uint64_t AtomicAddU64(volatile uint64_t *value, const uint64_t addend) {
7248  FPL_ASSERT(value != nullptr);
7249  uint32_t result = __sync_fetch_and_add(value, addend);
7250  return (result);
7251  }
7252  fpl_platform_api int64_t AtomicAddS64(volatile int64_t *value, const int64_t addend) {
7253  FPL_ASSERT(value != nullptr);
7254  uint32_t result = __sync_fetch_and_add(value, addend);
7255  return (result);
7256  }
7257 
7258  fpl_platform_api uint32_t AtomicCompareAndExchangeU32(volatile uint32_t *dest, const uint32_t comparand, const uint32_t exchange) {
7259  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
7260  uint32_t result = __sync_val_compare_and_swap(dest, comparand, exchange);
7261  return (result);
7262  }
7263  fpl_platform_api int32_t AtomicCompareAndExchangeS32(volatile int32_t *dest, const int32_t comparand, const int32_t exchange) {
7264  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
7265  int32_t result = __sync_val_compare_and_swap(dest, comparand, exchange);
7266  return (result);
7267  }
7268  fpl_platform_api uint64_t AtomicCompareAndExchangeU64(volatile uint64_t *dest, const uint64_t comparand, const uint64_t exchange) {
7269  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
7270  uint64_t result = __sync_val_compare_and_swap(dest, comparand, exchange);
7271  return (result);
7272  }
7273  fpl_platform_api int64_t AtomicCompareAndExchangeS64(volatile int64_t *dest, const int64_t comparand, const int64_t exchange) {
7274  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
7275  int64_t result = __sync_val_compare_and_swap(dest, comparand, exchange);
7276  return (result);
7277  }
7278 
7279  fpl_platform_api bool IsAtomicCompareAndExchangeU32(volatile uint32_t *dest, const uint32_t comparand, const uint32_t exchange) {
7280  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
7281  bool result = __sync_bool_compare_and_swap(dest, comparand, exchange);
7282  return (result);
7283  }
7284  fpl_platform_api bool IsAtomicCompareAndExchangeS32(volatile int32_t *dest, const int32_t comparand, const int32_t exchange) {
7285  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
7286  bool result = __sync_bool_compare_and_swap(dest, comparand, exchange);
7287  return (result);
7288  }
7289  fpl_platform_api bool IsAtomicCompareAndExchangeU64(volatile uint64_t *dest, const uint64_t comparand, const uint64_t exchange) {
7290  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
7291  bool result = __sync_bool_compare_and_swap(dest, comparand, exchange);
7292  return (result);
7293  }
7294  fpl_platform_api bool IsAtomicCompareAndExchangeS64(volatile int64_t *dest, const int64_t comparand, const int64_t exchange) {
7295  FPL_ASSERT(dest != nullptr);
7296  bool result = __sync_bool_compare_and_swap(dest, comparand, exchange);
7297  return (result);
7298  }
7299 
7300  fpl_platform_api uint32_t AtomicLoadU32(volatile uint32_t *source) {
7301  uint32_t result = __sync_fetch_and_or(source, 0);
7302  return(result);
7303  }
7304  fpl_platform_api uint64_t AtomicLoadU64(volatile uint64_t *source) {
7305  uint64_t result = __sync_fetch_and_or(source, 0);
7306  return(result);
7307  }
7308  fpl_platform_api int32_t AtomicLoadS32(volatile int32_t *source) {
7309  int32_t result = __sync_fetch_and_or(source, 0);
7310  return(result);
7311  }
7312  fpl_platform_api int64_t AtomicLoadS64(volatile int64_t *source) {
7313  int64_t result = __sync_fetch_and_or(source, 0);
7314  return(result);
7315  }
7316 
7317  fpl_platform_api void AtomicStoreU32(volatile uint32_t *dest, const uint32_t value) {
7318  __sync_lock_test_and_set(dest, value);
7319  __sync_synchronize();
7320  }
7321  fpl_platform_api void AtomicStoreU64(volatile uint64_t *dest, const uint64_t value) {
7322  __sync_lock_test_and_set(dest, value);
7323  __sync_synchronize();
7324  }
7325  fpl_platform_api void AtomicStoreS32(volatile int32_t *dest, const int32_t value) {
7326  __sync_lock_test_and_set(dest, value);
7327  __sync_synchronize();
7328  }
7329  fpl_platform_api void AtomicStoreS64(volatile int64_t *dest, const int64_t value) {
7330  __sync_lock_test_and_set(dest, value);
7331  __sync_synchronize();
7332  }
7333 # else
7334 # error "This POSIX compiler/platform is not supported!"
7335 # endif
7336  }
7337 
7338  //
7339  // POSIX Timings
7340  //
7341  namespace timings {
7342  fpl_platform_api double GetHighResolutionTimeInSeconds() {
7343  // @TODO(final): Do we need to take the performance frequency into account?
7344  timespec t;
7345  clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &t);
7346  double result = (double)t.tv_sec + ((double)t.tv_nsec * 1e-9);
7347  return(result);
7348  }
7349 
7350  fpl_platform_api uint64_t GetTimeInMilliseconds() {
7351  timespec t;
7352  clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &t);
7353  uint64_t result = t.tv_sec * 1000 + (uint64_t)(t.tv_nsec / 1.0e6);
7354  return(result);
7355  }
7356  }
7357 
7358  //
7359  // POSIX Threading
7360  //
7361  namespace threading {
7362  // @TODO(final): Move internal stuff into "platform" namespace!
7363  void *PosixThreadProc(void *data) {
7364  ThreadContext *context = (ThreadContext *)data;
7365  FPL_ASSERT(context != nullptr);
7366  atomics::AtomicStoreU32((volatile uint32_t *)&context->currentState, (uint32_t)ThreadState::Running);
7367  if(context->runFunc != nullptr) {
7368  context->runFunc(*context, context->data);
7369  }
7370  atomics::AtomicStoreU32((volatile uint32_t *)&context->currentState, (uint32_t)ThreadState::Stopped);
7371  pthread_exit(nullptr);
7372  }
7373 
7374  fpl_internal bool PosixMutexLock(const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI, pthread_mutex_t *handle) {
7375  int lockRes;
7376  do {
7377  lockRes = pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_lock(handle);
7378  } while(lockRes == EAGAIN);
7379  bool result = (lockRes == 0);
7380  return(result);
7381  }
7382 
7383  fpl_internal bool PosixMutexUnlock(const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI, pthread_mutex_t *handle) {
7384  int unlockRes;
7385  do {
7386  unlockRes = pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_unlock(handle);
7387  } while(unlockRes == EAGAIN);
7388  bool result = (unlockRes == 0);
7389  return(result);
7390  }
7391 
7392  fpl_internal int PosixMutexCreate(const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI, pthread_mutex_t *handle) {
7393  *handle = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
7394  int mutexRes;
7395  do {
7396  mutexRes = pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_init(handle, nullptr);
7397  } while(mutexRes == EAGAIN);
7398  return(mutexRes);
7399  }
7400 
7401  fpl_internal int PosixConditionCreate(const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI, pthread_cond_t *handle) {
7402  *handle = PTHREAD_COND_INITIALIZER;
7403  int condRes;
7404  do {
7405  condRes = pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_init(handle, nullptr);
7406  } while(condRes == EAGAIN);
7407  return(condRes);
7408  }
7409 
7410  fpl_internal bool PosixThreadWaitForMultiple(ThreadContext *contexts[], const uint32_t minCount, const uint32_t maxCount, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
7411  if(contexts == nullptr) {
7412  common::PushError("Contexts parameter are not allowed to be null");
7413  return false;
7414  }
7415  if(maxCount > common::MAX_THREAD_COUNT) {
7416  common::PushError("Count parameter '%d' must be less or equal than '%d'", maxCount, common::MAX_THREAD_COUNT);
7417  return false;
7418  }
7419  for(uint32_t index = 0; index < maxCount; ++index) {
7420  ThreadContext *context = contexts[index];
7421  if(context == nullptr) {
7422  common::PushError("Thread context for index '%d' are not allowed to be null", index);
7423  return false;
7424  }
7425  if(!context->isValid) {
7426  common::PushError("Thread for index '%d' is not valid", index);
7427  return false;
7428  }
7429  }
7430 
7431  volatile bool isRunning[fpl::common::MAX_THREAD_COUNT];
7432  for(uint32_t index = 0; index < maxCount; ++index) {
7433  isRunning[index] = true;
7434  }
7435 
7436  volatile uint32_t completeCount = 0;
7437  volatile uint64_t startTime = timings::GetTimeInMilliseconds();
7438  bool result = false;
7439  while(completeCount < minCount) {
7440  for(uint32_t index = 0; index < maxCount; ++index) {
7441  ThreadContext *context = contexts[index];
7442  if(isRunning[index]) {
7443  ThreadState state = GetThreadState(context);
7444  if(state == ThreadState::Stopped) {
7445  isRunning[index] = false;
7446  ++completeCount;
7447  if(completeCount >= minCount) {
7448  result = true;
7449  break;
7450  }
7451  }
7452  }
7453  ThreadSleep(10);
7454  }
7455  if((maxMilliseconds != UINT32_MAX) && (timings::GetTimeInMilliseconds() - startTime) >= maxMilliseconds) {
7456  result = false;
7457  break;
7458  }
7459  }
7460  return(result);
7461  }
7462 
7463  fpl_internal bool PosixSignalWaitForMultiple(const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI, ThreadMutex &mutex, ThreadSignal *signals[], const uint32_t minCount, const uint32_t maxCount, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds, const uint32_t smallWaitDuration = 5) {
7464  if(signals == nullptr) {
7465  common::PushError("Signals parameter are not allowed to be null");
7466  return false;
7467  }
7468  if(maxCount > common::MAX_SIGNAL_COUNT) {
7469  common::PushError("Count parameter '%d' must be less or equal than '%d'", maxCount, common::MAX_SIGNAL_COUNT);
7470  return false;
7471  }
7472  for(uint32_t index = 0; index < maxCount; ++index) {
7473  ThreadSignal *signal = signals[index];
7474  if(signal == nullptr) {
7475  common::PushError("Signal for index '%d' are not allowed to be null", index);
7476  return false;
7477  }
7478  if(!signal->isValid) {
7479  common::PushError("Signal for index '%d' is not valid", index);
7480  return false;
7481  }
7482  }
7483 
7484  volatile bool isSignaled[fpl::common::MAX_SIGNAL_COUNT];
7485  for(uint32_t index = 0; index < maxCount; ++index) {
7486  isSignaled[index] = false;
7487  }
7488 
7489 
7490  volatile uint32_t signaledCount = 0;
7491  volatile uint64_t startTime = timings::GetTimeInMilliseconds();
7492  bool result = false;
7493  while(signaledCount < minCount) {
7494  for(uint32_t index = 0; index < maxCount; ++index) {
7495  ThreadSignal *signal = signals[index];
7496  if(!isSignaled[index]) {
7497  timespec t = CreateWaitTimeSpec(smallWaitDuration);
7498  int condRes = pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_timedwait(&signal->internalHandle.posix.condition, &mutex.internalHandle.posix.mutex, &t);
7499  if(condRes == 0) {
7500  isSignaled[index] = true;
7501  ++signaledCount;
7502  if(signaledCount >= minCount) {
7503  result = true;
7504  break;
7505  }
7506  }
7507  }
7508  }
7509  if((maxMilliseconds != UINT32_MAX) && (timings::GetTimeInMilliseconds() - startTime) >= maxMilliseconds) {
7510  result = false;
7511  break;
7512  }
7513  }
7514  return(result);
7515  }
7516 
7517  fpl_platform_api void ThreadDestroy(ThreadContext *context) {
7518  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
7519  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7520  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7521  FPL_ASSERT(pthreadAPI.libHandle != nullptr);
7522  if(context != nullptr && context->isValid) {
7523  pthread_t threadHandle = context->internalHandle.posix.thread;
7524  pthread_mutex_t *mutexHandle = &context->internalHandle.posix.mutex;
7525  pthread_cond_t *condHandle = &context->internalHandle.posix.stopCondition;
7526 
7527  // If thread is not stopped yet, kill it and wait for termination
7528  if(pthreadAPI.pthread_kill(threadHandle, 0) == 0) {
7529  pthreadAPI.pthread_join(threadHandle, nullptr);
7530  }
7531  pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_destroy(condHandle);
7532  pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_destroy(mutexHandle);
7533  atomics::AtomicStoreU32((volatile uint32_t *)&context->currentState, (uint32_t)ThreadState::Stopped);
7534  *context = {};
7535  }
7536  }
7537 
7538  fpl_platform_api ThreadContext *ThreadCreate(run_thread_function *runFunc, void *data) {
7539  FPL_ASSERT(platform::global__AppState != nullptr);
7540  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7541  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7542  ThreadContext *result = nullptr;
7543  ThreadContext *context = common::GetFreeThreadContext();
7544  if(context != nullptr) {
7545  context->currentState = ThreadState::Stopped;
7546  context->data = data;
7547  context->runFunc = runFunc;
7548  context->isValid = false;
7549  context->isStopping = false;
7550 
7551  // Create mutex
7552  int mutexRes = PosixMutexCreate(pthreadAPI, &context->internalHandle.posix.mutex);
7553  if(mutexRes != 0) {
7554  common::PushError("Failed creating pthread mutex, error code: %d", mutexRes);
7555  }
7556 
7557  // Create stop condition
7558  int condRes = -1;
7559  if(mutexRes == 0) {
7560  condRes = PosixConditionCreate(pthreadAPI, &context->internalHandle.posix.stopCondition);
7561  if(condRes != 0) {
7562  common::PushError("Failed creating pthread condition, error code: %d", condRes);
7563  pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_destroy(&context->internalHandle.posix.mutex);
7564  }
7565  }
7566 
7567  // Create thread
7568  int threadRes = -1;
7569  if(condRes == 0) {
7570  context->isValid = true;
7571  // @TODO(final): Better pthread id!
7572  memory::MemoryCopy(&context->internalHandle.posix.thread, FPL_MIN(sizeof(context->id), sizeof(context->internalHandle.posix.thread)), &context->id);
7573  do {
7574  threadRes = pthreadAPI.pthread_create(&context->internalHandle.posix.thread, nullptr, PosixThreadProc, (void *)context);
7575  } while(threadRes == EAGAIN);
7576  if(threadRes != 0) {
7577  common::PushError("Failed creating pthread, error code: %d", threadRes);
7578  pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_destroy(&context->internalHandle.posix.stopCondition);
7579  pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_destroy(&context->internalHandle.posix.mutex);
7580  }
7581  }
7582 
7583  if(threadRes == 0) {
7584  result = context;
7585  } else {
7586  *context = {};
7587  }
7588  } else {
7589  common::PushError("All %d threads are in use, you cannot create until you free one", common::MAX_THREAD_COUNT);
7590  }
7591  return(result);
7592  }
7593 
7594  fpl_platform_api bool ThreadWaitForOne(ThreadContext *context, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
7595  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7596  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7597  FPL_ASSERT(pthreadAPI.libHandle != nullptr);
7598  bool result = false;
7599  if(context != nullptr && context->isValid) {
7600  // Set a flag and signal indicating that this thread is being stopped
7601  pthread_mutex_t *mutexHandle = &context->internalHandle.posix.mutex;
7602  pthread_cond_t *condHandle = &context->internalHandle.posix.stopCondition;
7603  if(PosixMutexLock(pthreadAPI, mutexHandle)) {
7604  context->isStopping = true;
7605  pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_signal(condHandle);
7606  pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_broadcast(condHandle);
7607  PosixMutexUnlock(pthreadAPI, mutexHandle);
7608  }
7609 
7610  // Wait until it shuts down
7611  pthread_t threadHandle = context->internalHandle.posix.thread;
7612  int joinRes = pthreadAPI.pthread_join(threadHandle, nullptr);
7613  result = (joinRes == 0);
7614  }
7615  return (result);
7616  }
7617 
7618  fpl_platform_api bool ThreadWaitForAll(ThreadContext *contexts[], const uint32_t count, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
7619  bool result = PosixThreadWaitForMultiple(contexts, count, count, maxMilliseconds);
7620  return(result);
7621  }
7622 
7623  fpl_platform_api bool ThreadWaitForAny(ThreadContext *contexts[], const uint32_t count, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
7624  bool result = PosixThreadWaitForMultiple(contexts, 1, count, maxMilliseconds);
7625  return(result);
7626  }
7627 
7628  fpl_platform_api void ThreadSleep(const uint32_t milliseconds) {
7629  uint32_t ms;
7630  uint32_t s;
7631  if(milliseconds > 1000) {
7632  s = milliseconds / 1000;
7633  ms = milliseconds % 1000;
7634  } else {
7635  s = 0;
7636  ms = milliseconds;
7637  }
7638  timespec input, output;
7639  input.tv_sec = s;
7640  input.tv_nsec = ms * 1000000;
7641  nanosleep(&input, &output);
7642  }
7643 
7644  fpl_platform_api ThreadMutex MutexCreate() {
7645  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7646  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7647  ThreadMutex result = {};
7648  int mutexRes = PosixMutexCreate(pthreadAPI, &result.internalHandle.posix.mutex);
7649  result.isValid = (mutexRes == 0);
7650  return(result);
7651  }
7652 
7653  fpl_platform_api void MutexDestroy(ThreadMutex &mutex) {
7654  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7655  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7656  if(mutex.isValid) {
7657  pthread_mutex_t *handle = &mutex.internalHandle.posix.mutex;
7658  pthreadAPI.pthread_mutex_destroy(handle);
7659  }
7660  mutex = {};
7661  }
7662 
7663  fpl_platform_api bool MutexLock(ThreadMutex &mutex, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
7664  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7665  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7666  bool result = false;
7667  if(mutex.isValid) {
7668  pthread_mutex_t *handle = &mutex.internalHandle.posix.mutex;
7669  result = PosixMutexLock(pthreadAPI, handle);
7670  }
7671  return (result);
7672  }
7673 
7674  fpl_platform_api bool MutexUnlock(ThreadMutex &mutex) {
7675  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7676  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7677  bool result = false;
7678  if(mutex.isValid) {
7679  pthread_mutex_t *handle = &mutex.internalHandle.posix.mutex;
7680  result = PosixMutexUnlock(pthreadAPI, handle);
7681  }
7682  return (result);
7683  }
7684 
7685  fpl_platform_api ThreadSignal SignalCreate() {
7686  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7687  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7688  ThreadSignal result = {};
7689  int condRes = PosixConditionCreate(pthreadAPI, &result.internalHandle.posix.condition);
7690  result.isValid = (condRes == 0);
7691  return(result);
7692  }
7693 
7694  fpl_platform_api void SignalDestroy(ThreadSignal &signal) {
7695  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7696  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7697  if(signal.isValid) {
7698  pthread_cond_t *handle = &signal.internalHandle.posix.condition;
7699  pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_destroy(handle);
7700  }
7701  signal = {};
7702  }
7703 
7704  fpl_internal_inline timespec CreateWaitTimeSpec(const uint32_t milliseconds) {
7705  time_t secs = milliseconds / 1000;
7706  uint64_t nanoSecs = (milliseconds - (secs * 1000)) * 1000000;
7707  if(nanoSecs >= 1000000000) {
7708  time_t addonSecs = (time_t)(nanoSecs / 1000000000);
7709  nanoSecs -= (addonSecs * 1000000000);
7710  secs += addonSecs;
7711  }
7712  timespec result;
7713  clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &result);
7714  result.tv_sec += secs;
7715  result.tv_nsec += nanoSecs;
7716  return(result);
7717  }
7718 
7719  fpl_platform_api bool SignalWaitForOne(ThreadMutex &mutex, ThreadSignal &signal, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
7720  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7721  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7722  if(!signal.isValid) {
7723  common::PushError("Signal is not valid");
7724  return(false);
7725  }
7726  if(!mutex.isValid) {
7727  common::PushError("Mutex is not valid");
7728  return(false);
7729  }
7730  if(maxMilliseconds != UINT32_MAX) {
7731  timespec t = CreateWaitTimeSpec(maxMilliseconds);
7732  pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_timedwait(&signal.internalHandle.posix.condition, &mutex.internalHandle.posix.mutex, &t);
7733  } else {
7734  pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_wait(&signal.internalHandle.posix.condition, &mutex.internalHandle.posix.mutex);
7735  }
7736  return(true);
7737  }
7738 
7739  fpl_platform_api bool SignalWaitForAll(ThreadMutex &mutex, ThreadSignal *signals[], const uint32_t count, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
7740  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7741  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7742  bool result = PosixSignalWaitForMultiple(pthreadAPI, mutex, signals, count, count, maxMilliseconds);
7743  return(result);
7744  }
7745 
7746  fpl_platform_api bool SignalWaitForAny(ThreadMutex &mutex, ThreadSignal *signals[], const uint32_t count, const uint32_t maxMilliseconds) {
7747  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7748  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7749  bool result = PosixSignalWaitForMultiple(pthreadAPI, mutex, signals, 1, count, maxMilliseconds);
7750  return(result);
7751  }
7752 
7753  fpl_platform_api bool SignalSet(ThreadSignal &signal) {
7754  const platform::PlatformAppState *appState = platform::global__AppState;
7755  const platform::PThreadAPI &pthreadAPI = appState->linux.posix.pthreadApi;
7756  bool result = false;
7757  if(signal.isValid) {
7758  pthread_cond_t *handle = &signal.internalHandle.posix.condition;
7759  int condRes = pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_signal(handle);
7760  pthreadAPI.pthread_cond_broadcast(handle);
7761  result = (condRes == 0);
7762  }
7763  return(result);
7764  }
7765  }
7766 
7767  //
7768  // POSIX Library
7769  //
7770  namespace library {
7771  fpl_platform_api DynamicLibraryHandle DynamicLibraryLoad(const char *libraryFilePath) {
7772  DynamicLibraryHandle result = {};
7773  if(libraryFilePath != nullptr) {
7774  // @TODO(final): Is RTLD_NOW for dlopen correct?
7775  void *p = dlopen(libraryFilePath, RTLD_NOW);
7776  if(p != nullptr) {
7777  result.internalHandle.posixHandle = p;
7778  result.isValid = true;
7779  }
7780  }
7781  return(result);
7782  }
7783 
7784  fpl_platform_api void *GetDynamicLibraryProc(const DynamicLibraryHandle &handle, const char *name) {
7785  void *result = nullptr;
7786  if(handle.internalHandle.posixHandle != nullptr && name != nullptr) {
7787  void *p = handle.internalHandle.posixHandle;
7788  result = dlsym(p, name);
7789  }
7790  return(result);
7791  }
7792 
7793  fpl_platform_api void DynamicLibraryUnload(DynamicLibraryHandle &handle) {
7794  if(handle.internalHandle.posixHandle != nullptr) {
7795  void *p = handle.internalHandle.posixHandle;
7796  dlclose(p);
7797  handle = {};
7798  }
7799  }
7800  }
7801 
7802 
7803  //
7804  // POSIX Console
7805  //
7806  namespace console {
7807  fpl_platform_api void ConsoleOut(const char *text) {
7808  if(text != nullptr) {
7809  fprintf(stdout, "%s", text);
7810  }
7811  }
7812  fpl_platform_api void ConsoleFormatOut(const char *format, ...) {
7813  if(format != nullptr) {
7814  va_list vaList;
7815  va_start(vaList, format);
7816  vfprintf(stdout, format, vaList);
7817  va_end(vaList);
7818  }
7819  }
7820  fpl_platform_api void ConsoleError(const char *text) {
7821  if(text != nullptr) {
7822  fprintf(stderr, "%s", text);
7823  }
7824  }
7825  fpl_platform_api void ConsoleFormatError(const char *format, ...) {
7826  if(format != nullptr) {
7827  va_list vaList;
7828  va_start(vaList, format);
7829  vfprintf(stderr, format, vaList);
7830  va_end(vaList);
7831  }
7832  }
7833  fpl_platform_api const char ConsoleWaitForCharInput() {
7834  int c = getchar();
7835  const char result = (c >= 0 && c < 256) ? (char)c : 0;
7836  return(result);
7837  }
7838  }
7839 
7840  //
7841  // POSIX Memory
7842  //
7843  namespace memory {
7844  fpl_platform_api void *MemoryAllocate(const size_t size) {
7845  // @NOTE(final): MAP_ANONYMOUS ensures that the memory is cleared to zero.
7846 
7847  // Allocate empty memory to hold the size + some arbitary padding + the actual data
7848  size_t newSize = sizeof(size_t) + sizeof(uintptr_t) + size;
7849  void *basePtr = mmap(nullptr, newSize, PROT_READ | PROT_WRITE, MAP_PRIVATE | MAP_ANONYMOUS, -1, 0);
7850 
7851  // Write the size at the beginning
7852  *(size_t *)basePtr = newSize;
7853 
7854  // The resulting address starts after the arbitary padding
7855  void *result = (uint8_t *)basePtr + sizeof(size_t) + sizeof(uintptr_t);
7856  return(result);
7857  }
7858 
7859  fpl_platform_api void MemoryFree(void *ptr) {
7860  // Free the base pointer which is stored to the left at the start of the size_t
7861  void *basePtr = (void *)((uint8_t *)ptr - (sizeof(uintptr_t) + sizeof(size_t)));
7862  size_t storedSize = *(size_t *)basePtr;
7863  munmap(basePtr, storedSize);
7864  }
7865  }
7866 
7867  //
7868  // POSIX Strings
7869  //
7870  namespace strings {
7871  fpl_platform_api char *WideStringToAnsiString(const wchar_t *wideSource, const uint32_t maxWideSourceLen, char *ansiDest, const uint32_t maxAnsiDestLen) {
7872  if(wideSource == nullptr) {
7873  common::PushError("Wide source parameter are not allowed to be null");
7874  return nullptr;
7875  }
7876  if(ansiDest == nullptr) {
7877  common::PushError("Ansi dest parameter are not allowed to be null");
7878  return nullptr;
7879  }
7880  uint32_t requiredLen = wcstombs(nullptr, wideSource, maxWideSourceLen);
7881  if(maxAnsiDestLen < (requiredLen + 1)) {
7882  common::PushError("Max ansi dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than ''", maxAnsiDestLen, (requiredLen + 1));
7883  return nullptr;
7884  }
7885  wcstombs(ansiDest, wideSource, maxWideSourceLen);
7886  ansiDest[requiredLen] = 0;
7887  return(ansiDest);
7888  }
7889  fpl_platform_api char *WideStringToUTF8String(const wchar_t *wideSource, const uint32_t maxWideSourceLen, char *utf8Dest, const uint32_t maxUtf8DestLen) {
7890  if(wideSource == nullptr) {
7891  common::PushError("Wide source parameter are not allowed to be null");
7892  return nullptr;
7893  }
7894  if(utf8Dest == nullptr) {
7895  common::PushError("UTF8 dest parameter are not allowed to be null");
7896  return nullptr;
7897  }
7898  // @TODO(final): UTF-8!
7899  uint32_t requiredLen = wcstombs(nullptr, wideSource, maxWideSourceLen);
7900  if(maxUtf8DestLen < (requiredLen + 1)) {
7901  common::PushError("Max utf8 dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than ''", maxUtf8DestLen, (requiredLen + 1));
7902  return nullptr;
7903  }
7904  wcstombs(utf8Dest, wideSource, maxWideSourceLen);
7905  utf8Dest[requiredLen] = 0;
7906  return(utf8Dest);
7907  }
7908  fpl_platform_api wchar_t *AnsiStringToWideString(const char *ansiSource, const uint32_t ansiSourceLen, wchar_t *wideDest, const uint32_t maxWideDestLen) {
7909  if(ansiSource == nullptr) {
7910  common::PushError("Ansi source parameter are not allowed to be null");
7911  return nullptr;
7912  }
7913  if(wideDest == nullptr) {
7914  common::PushError("Wide dest parameter are not allowed to be null");
7915  return nullptr;
7916  }
7917  uint32_t requiredLen = mbstowcs(nullptr, ansiSource, ansiSourceLen);
7918  if(maxWideDestLen < (requiredLen + 1)) {
7919  common::PushError("Max wide dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxWideDestLen, (requiredLen + 1));
7920  return nullptr;
7921  }
7922  mbstowcs(wideDest, ansiSource, ansiSourceLen);
7923  wideDest[requiredLen] = 0;
7924  return(wideDest);
7925  }
7926  fpl_platform_api wchar_t *UTF8StringToWideString(const char *utf8Source, const uint32_t utf8SourceLen, wchar_t *wideDest, const uint32_t maxWideDestLen) {
7927  if(utf8Source == nullptr) {
7928  common::PushError("UTF8 source parameter are not allowed to be null");
7929  return nullptr;
7930  }
7931  if(wideDest == nullptr) {
7932  common::PushError("Wide dest parameter are not allowed to be null");
7933  return nullptr;
7934  }
7935  // @TODO(final): UTF-8!
7936  uint32_t requiredLen = mbstowcs(nullptr, utf8Source, utf8SourceLen);
7937  if(maxWideDestLen < (requiredLen + 1)) {
7938  common::PushError("Max wide dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxWideDestLen, (requiredLen + 1));
7939  return nullptr;
7940  }
7941  mbstowcs(wideDest, utf8Source, utf8SourceLen);
7942  wideDest[requiredLen] = 0;
7943  return(wideDest);
7944  }
7945  fpl_platform_api char *FormatAnsiString(char *ansiDestBuffer, const uint32_t maxAnsiDestBufferLen, const char *format, ...) {
7946  if(ansiDestBuffer == nullptr) {
7947  common::PushError("Ansi dest buffer parameter are not allowed to be null");
7948  return nullptr;
7949  }
7950  if(maxAnsiDestBufferLen == 0) {
7951  common::PushError("Max ansi dest len parameter must be greater that zero");
7952  return nullptr;
7953  }
7954  if(format == nullptr) {
7955  common::PushError("Format parameter are not allowed to be null");
7956  return nullptr;
7957  }
7958  va_list argList;
7959  va_start(argList, format);
7960  // @NOTE(final): Need to clear the first character, otherwise vsnprintf() does weird things... O_o
7961  ansiDestBuffer[0] = 0;
7962  int charCount = vsnprintf(ansiDestBuffer, maxAnsiDestBufferLen, format, argList);
7963  if(charCount < 0) {
7964  common::PushError("Format parameter are '%s' are invalid!", format);
7965  return nullptr;
7966  }
7967  if((int)maxAnsiDestBufferLen < (charCount + 1)) {
7968  common::PushError("Max ansi dest len parameter '%d' must be greater or equal than '%d'", maxAnsiDestBufferLen, (charCount + 1));
7969  return nullptr;
7970  }
7971  va_end(argList);
7972  FPL_ASSERT(charCount > 0);
7973  ansiDestBuffer[charCount] = 0;
7974  char *result = ansiDestBuffer;
7975  return(result);
7976  }
7977  }
7978 
7979  //
7980  // POSIX Files
7981  //
7982  namespace files {
7983  fpl_platform_api FileHandle OpenBinaryFile(const char *filePath) {
7984  FileHandle result = {};
7985  if(filePath != nullptr) {
7986  int posixFileHandle;
7987  do {
7988  posixFileHandle = ::open(filePath, O_RDONLY);
7989  } while(posixFileHandle == -1 && errno == EINTR);
7990  if(posixFileHandle != -1) {
7991  result.isValid = true;
7992  result.internalHandle.posix.handle = posixFileHandle;
7993  }
7994  }
7995  return(result);
7996  }
7997  fpl_platform_api FileHandle OpenBinaryFile(const wchar_t *filePath) {
7998  FileHandle result = {};
7999  if(filePath != nullptr) {
8000  char utf8FilePath[1024] = {};
8001  strings::WideStringToAnsiString(filePath, strings::GetWideStringLength(filePath), utf8FilePath, FPL_ARRAYCOUNT(utf8FilePath));
8002  result = OpenBinaryFile(utf8FilePath);
8003  }
8004  return(result);
8005  }
8006 
8007  fpl_platform_api FileHandle CreateBinaryFile(const char *filePath) {
8008  FileHandle result = {};
8009  if(filePath != nullptr) {
8010  int posixFileHandle;
8011  do {
8012  posixFileHandle = ::open(filePath, O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC);
8013  } while(posixFileHandle == -1 && errno == EINTR);
8014  if(posixFileHandle != -1) {
8015  result.isValid = true;
8016  result.internalHandle.posix.handle = posixFileHandle;
8017  }
8018  }
8019  return(result);
8020  }
8021  fpl_platform_api FileHandle CreateBinaryFile(const wchar_t *filePath) {
8022  FileHandle result = {};
8023  if(filePath != nullptr) {
8024  char utf8FilePath[1024] = {};
8025  strings::WideStringToAnsiString(filePath, strings::GetWideStringLength(filePath), utf8FilePath, FPL_ARRAYCOUNT(utf8FilePath));
8026  result = CreateBinaryFile(utf8FilePath);
8027  }
8028  return(result);
8029  }
8030 
8031  fpl_platform_api uint32_t ReadFileBlock32(const FileHandle &fileHandle, const uint32_t sizeToRead, void *targetBuffer, const uint32_t maxTargetBufferSize) {
8032  if(sizeToRead == 0) {
8033  return 0;
8034  }
8035  if(targetBuffer == nullptr) {
8036  common::PushError("Target buffer parameter are now allowed to be null");
8037  return 0;
8038  }
8039  if(!fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle) {
8040  common::PushError("File handle is not opened for reading");
8041  return 0;
8042  }
8043  int posixFileHandle = fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle;
8044 
8045  ssize_t res;
8046  do {
8047  res = ::read(posixFileHandle, targetBuffer, sizeToRead);
8048  } while(res == -1 && errno == EINTR);
8049 
8050  uint32_t result = 0;
8051  if(res != -1) {
8052  result = (uint32_t)res;
8053  }
8054  return(result);
8055  }
8056 
8057  fpl_platform_api uint32_t WriteFileBlock32(const FileHandle &fileHandle, void *sourceBuffer, const uint32_t sourceSize) {
8058  if(sourceSize == 0) {
8059  return 0;
8060  }
8061  if(sourceBuffer == nullptr) {
8062  common::PushError("Source buffer parameter are now allowed to be null");
8063  return 0;
8064  }
8065  if(!fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle) {
8066  common::PushError("File handle is not opened for writing");
8067  return 0;
8068  }
8069 
8070  int posixFileHandle = fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle;
8071 
8072  ssize_t res;
8073  do {
8074  res = ::write(posixFileHandle, sourceBuffer, sourceSize);
8075  } while(res == -1 && errno == EINTR);
8076 
8077  uint32_t result = 0;
8078  if(res != -1) {
8079  result = (uint32_t)res;
8080  }
8081  return(result);
8082  }
8083 
8084  fpl_platform_api void SetFilePosition32(const FileHandle &fileHandle, const int32_t position, const FilePositionMode mode) {
8085  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle) {
8086  int posixFileHandle = fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle;
8087  int whence = SEEK_SET;
8088  if(mode == FilePositionMode::Current) {
8089  whence = SEEK_CUR;
8090  } else if(mode == FilePositionMode::End) {
8091  whence = SEEK_END;
8092  }
8093  ::lseek(posixFileHandle, position, whence);
8094  }
8095  }
8096 
8097  fpl_platform_api uint32_t GetFilePosition32(const FileHandle &fileHandle) {
8098  uint32_t result = 0;
8099  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle) {
8100  int posixFileHandle = fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle;
8101  off_t res = ::lseek(posixFileHandle, 0, SEEK_CUR);
8102  if(res != -1) {
8103  result = (uint32_t)res;
8104  }
8105  }
8106  return(result);
8107  }
8108 
8109  fpl_platform_api void CloseFile(FileHandle &fileHandle) {
8110  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle) {
8111  int posixFileHandle = fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle;
8112  ::close(posixFileHandle);
8113  fileHandle = {};
8114  }
8115  }
8116 
8117  fpl_platform_api uint32_t GetFileSize32(const char *filePath) {
8118  uint32_t result = 0;
8119  if(filePath != nullptr) {
8120  int posixFileHandle;
8121  do {
8122  posixFileHandle = ::open(filePath, O_RDONLY);
8123  } while(posixFileHandle == -1 && errno == EINTR);
8124  if(posixFileHandle != -1) {
8125  off_t res = ::lseek(posixFileHandle, 0, SEEK_END);
8126  if(res != -1) {
8127  result = (uint32_t)res;
8128  }
8129  ::close(posixFileHandle);
8130  }
8131  }
8132  return(result);
8133  }
8134 
8135  fpl_platform_api uint32_t GetFileSize32(const FileHandle &fileHandle) {
8136  uint32_t result = 0;
8137  if(fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle) {
8138  int posixFileHandle = fileHandle.internalHandle.posix.handle;
8139  off_t curPos = ::lseek(posixFileHandle, 0, SEEK_CUR);
8140  if(curPos != -1) {
8141  result = (uint32_t)::lseek(posixFileHandle, 0, SEEK_END);
8142  ::lseek(posixFileHandle, curPos, SEEK_SET);
8143  }
8144  }
8145  return(result);
8146  }
8147 
8148  fpl_platform_api bool FileExists(const char *filePath) {
8149  bool result = false;
8150  if(filePath != nullptr) {
8151  result = ::access(filePath, F_OK) != -1 );
8152  }
8153  return(result);
8154  }
8155 
8156  fpl_platform_api bool FileCopy(const char *sourceFilePath, const char *targetFilePath, const bool overwrite) {
8157  if(sourceFilePath == nullptr) {
8158  common::PushError("Source file path parameter are not allowed to be null");
8159  return false;
8160  }
8161  if(targetFilePath == nullptr) {
8162  common::PushError("Target file path parameter are not allowed to be null");
8163  return false;
8164  }
8165  bool result = false;
8166 
8167  // @IMPLEMENT(final): POSIX FileCopy - there is no built-in copy-file function in POSIX so we open a file and buffer copy it over
8168 
8169  return(result);
8170  }
8171 
8172  fpl_platform_api bool FileMove(const char *sourceFilePath, const char *targetFilePath) {
8173  if(sourceFilePath == nullptr) {
8174  common::PushError("Source file path parameter are not allowed to be null");
8175  return false;
8176  }
8177  if(targetFilePath == nullptr) {
8178  common::PushError("Target file path parameter are not allowed to be null");
8179  return false;
8180  }
8181  bool result = ::rename(sourceFilePath, targetFilePath) == 0;
8182  return(result);
8183  }
8184 
8185  fpl_platform_api bool FileDelete(const char *filePath) {
8186  if(filePath == nullptr) {
8187  common::PushError("File path parameter are not allowed to be null");
8188  return false;
8189  }
8190  bool result = ::unlink(filePath) == 0;
8191  return(result);
8192  }
8193 
8194  fpl_platform_api bool DirectoryExists(const char *path) {
8195  bool result = false;
8196  if(path != nullptr) {
8197  struct stat sb;
8198  result = (::stat(path, &sb) == 0) && S_ISDIR(sb.st_mode);
8199  }
8200  return(result);
8201  }
8202 
8203  fpl_platform_api bool CreateDirectories(const char *path) {
8204  if(path == nullptr) {
8205  common::PushError("Path parameter are not allowed to be null");
8206  return false;
8207  }
8208  bool result = ::mkdir(path, S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG | S_IRWXO) == 0;
8209  return(result);
8210  }
8211  fpl_platform_api bool RemoveEmptyDirectory(const char *path) {
8212  if(path == nullptr) {
8213  common::PushError("Path parameter are not allowed to be null");
8214  return false;
8215  }
8216  bool result = ::rmdir(path) == 0;
8217  return(result);
8218  }
8219  fpl_platform_api bool ListFilesBegin(const char *pathAndFilter, FileEntry &firstEntry) {
8220  if(pathAndFilter == nullptr) {
8221  return false;
8222  }
8223  bool result = false;
8224  // @IMPLEMENT(final): POSIX ListFilesBegin
8225  return(result);
8226  }
8227  fpl_platform_api bool ListFilesNext(FileEntry &nextEntry) {
8228  bool result = false;
8229  if(nextEntry.internalHandle.posix.fileHandle) {
8230  // @IMPLEMENT(final): POSIX ListFilesNext
8231  }
8232  return(result);
8233  }
8234  fpl_platform_api void ListFilesEnd(FileEntry &lastEntry) {
8235  if(lastEntry.internalHandle.posix.fileHandle) {
8236  // @IMPLEMENT(final): POSIX ListFilesEnd
8237  lastEntry = {};
8238  }
8239  }
8240  } // files
8241 } // fpl
8242 
8243 #endif // FPL_SUBPLATFORM_POSIX
8244
